slider.Minimum)*Math.Max(position.X-5,0)/(slider.ActualWidth-10) + slider.Minimum;          Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

8906645Di2015UniqueSeparatorprotected void Page_Load(object sender, EventArgs e)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine        if (Page.IsPostBack == false)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine                System.IO.DirectoryInfo RootDir = new System.IO.DirectoryInfo(Server.MapPath("~/"));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // output the directory into a nodeDi2015NewLine                TreeNode RootNode = OutputDirectory(RootDir, null);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // add the output to the treeDi2015NewLine                TreeView1.Nodes.Add(RootNode);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineTreeNode OutputDirectory(System.IO.DirectoryInfo directory, TreeNode parentNode)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine        // validate paramDi2015NewLine        if (directory == null) return null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // create a node for this directoryDi2015NewLine        TreeNode DirNode = new TreeNode(directory.Name);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // get subdirectories of the current directoryDi2015NewLine        System.IO.DirectoryInfo[] SubDirectories = directory.GetDirectories();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // output each subdirectoryDi2015NewLine        for (int DirectoryCount = 0; DirectoryCount < SubDirectories.Length; DirectoryCount++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine                OutputDirectory(SubDirectories[DirectoryCount], DirNode);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // output the current directories filesDi2015NewLine        System.IO.FileInfo[] Files = directory.GetFiles();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        for (int FileCount = 0; FileCount < Files.Length; FileCount++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine                DirNode.ChildNodes.Add(new TreeNode(Files[FileCount].Name));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // if the parent node is null, return this nodeDi2015NewLine        // otherwise add this node to the parent and return the parentDi2015NewLine        if (parentNode == null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine                return DirNode;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine                parentNode.ChildNodes.Add(DirNode);Di2015NewLine                return parentNode;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

          if (p.X >= checkBoxLocation.X && p.X <=Di2015NewLine            checkBoxLocation.X + checkBoxSize.WidthDi2015NewLine            && p.Y >= checkBoxLocation.Y && p.Y <=Di2015NewLine            checkBoxLocation.Y + checkBoxSize.Height)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                _checked = !_checked;Di2015NewLine                if (OnCheckBoxClicked != null)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    OnCheckBoxClicked(e.ColumnIndex, _checked);Di2015NewLine                    this.DataGridView.InvalidateCell(this);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            base.OnMouseClick(e);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    #endregionDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    #region ColumnSelectionDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    class DataGridViewColumnSelectorDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // the DataGridView to which the DataGridViewColumnSelector is attachedDi2015NewLine        private DataGridView mDataGridView = null;Di2015NewLine        // a CheckedListBox containing the column header text and checkboxesDi2015NewLine        private CheckedListBox mCheckedListBox;Di2015NewLine        // a ToolStripDropDown object used to show the popupDi2015NewLine        private ToolStripDropDown mPopup;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// The max height of the popupDi2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        public int MaxHeight = 300;Di2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// The width of the popupDi2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        public int Width = 200;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// Gets or sets the DataGridView to which the DataGridViewColumnSelector is attachedDi2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        public DataGridView DataGridViewDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            get { return mDataGridView; }Di2015NewLine            setDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // If any, remove handler from current DataGridView Di2015NewLine                if (mDataGridView != null) mDataGridView.CellMouseClick -= new DataGridViewCellMouseEventHandler(mDataGridView_CellMouseClick);Di2015NewLine                // Set the new DataGridViewDi2015NewLine                mDataGridView = value;Di2015NewLine                // Attach CellMouseClick handler to DataGridViewDi2015NewLine                if (mDataGridView != null) mDataGridView.CellMouseClick += new DataGridViewCellMouseEventHandler(mDataGridView_CellMouseClick);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // When user right-clicks the cell origin, it clears and fill the CheckedListBox withDi2015NewLine        // columns header text. Then it shows the popup. Di2015NewLine        // In this way the CheckedListBox items are always refreshed to reflect changes occurred in Di2015NewLine        // DataGridView columns (column additions or name changes and so on).Di2015NewLine        void mDataGridView_CellMouseClick(object sender, DataGridViewCellMouseEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (e.Button == MouseButtons.Right && e.RowIndex == -1 && e.ColumnIndex == 0)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                mCheckedListBox.Items.Clear();Di2015NewLine                foreach (DataGridViewColumn c in mDataGridView.Columns)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    mCheckedListBox.Items.Add(c.HeaderText, c.Visible);Di2015NewLine                }                Di2015NewLine                int PreferredHeight = (mCheckedListBox.Items.Count * 16) + 7;Di2015NewLine                mCheckedListBox.Height = (PreferredHeight < MaxHeight) ? PreferredHeight : MaxHeight;Di2015NewLine                mCheckedListBox.Width = this.Width;Di2015NewLine                mPopup.Show(mDataGridView.PointToScreen(new Point(e.X, e.Y)));Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // The constructor creates an instance of CheckedListBox and ToolStripDropDown.Di2015NewLine        // the CheckedListBox is hosted by ToolStripControlHost, which in turn isDi2015NewLine        // added to ToolStripDropDown.Di2015NewLine        public DataGridViewColumnSelector()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            mCheckedListBox = new CheckedListBox();Di2015NewLine            mCheckedListBox.CheckOnClick = true;Di2015NewLine            mCheckedListBox.ItemCheck += new ItemCheckEventHandler(mCheckedListBox_ItemCheck);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            ToolStripControlHost mControlHost = new ToolStripControlHost(mCheckedListBox);Di2015NewLine            mControlHost.Padding = Padding.Empty;Di2015NewLine            mControlHost.Margin = Padding.Empty;Di2015NewLine            mControlHost.AutoSize = false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            mPopup = new ToolStripDropDown();Di2015NewLine            mPopup.Padding = Padding.Empty;Di2015NewLine            mPopup.Items.Add(mControlHost);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public DataGridViewColumnSelector(DataGridView dgv)Di2015NewLine            : this()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            this.DataGridView = dgv;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // When user checks / unchecks a checkbox, the related column visibility is Di2015NewLine        // switched.Di2015NewLine        void mCheckedListBox_ItemCheck(object sender, ItemCheckEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            mDataGridView.Columns[e.Index].Visible = (e.NewValue == CheckState.Checked);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    #endregionDi2015NewLine

8914014Di2015UniqueSeparatorDECLARE @CNVAL varchar(100) = 'test'Di2015NewLineDECLARE @ATRBT varchar(100) = 'some attribute'Di2015NewLineDECLARE @CON varchar(100) = 'the name'Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineMERGE into CNEXTRA as targetDi2015NewLine  USING ( VALUES( @CON, @ATRBT, @CNVAL))Di2015NewLine      AS source([Name], ATRBT, CNVAL)Di2015NewLine      ON (target.ATRBT = source.ATRBT)Di2015NewLine      AND (target.[Name] = source.[Name])Di2015NewLine  WHEN MATCHED THENDi2015NewLine     UPDATE SETDi2015NewLine        CNVAL = source.CNVALDi2015NewLine  WHEN NOT MATCHED THENDi2015NewLine     INSERT([Name], ATRBT, CNVAL)Di2015NewLine     VALUES(source.[Name], source.ATRBT, source.CNVAL)Di2015NewLine;Di2015NewLine

8914611Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic interface IProgressDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    ManualResetEvent syncEvent { get; }Di2015NewLine    void updateProgressBarValue(int state);Di2015NewLine    void updateDataGridViewValue(int state);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic partial class Form1 : Form, IProgressDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // Sync object will be used to syncronize threadsDi2015NewLine    public ManualResetEvent syncEvent { get; private set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public Form1()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void button1_Click(object sender, EventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Creeate sync object in unsignalled stateDi2015NewLine        syncEvent = new ManualResetEvent(false);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // I like Async model to start background workersDi2015NewLine        // That code will utilize threads from the thread poolDi2015NewLine        ((Action<IProgress>)Process1).BeginInvoke(this, null, null);Di2015NewLine        ((Action<IProgress>)Process2).BeginInvoke(this, null, null);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void updateProgressBarValue(int state)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // InvokeRequired? -> Invoke pattern will prevent UI update from the non UI threadDi2015NewLine        if (InvokeRequired)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // If current thread isn't UI method will invoke into UI thread itselfDi2015NewLine            Invoke((Action<int>)updateProgressBarValue, state);Di2015NewLine            return;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        double val = Convert.ToDouble(state) / 19.0;Di2015NewLine        pb.Value = (int)(100 * val);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void updateDataGridViewValue(int state)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (InvokeRequired)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Invoke((Action<int>)updateDataGridViewValue, state);Di2015NewLine            return;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        dgv.Rows.Add((int)state, (int)state);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void Process1(IProgress progress)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < 10; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // We have InvokeRequired in the methods and don't need any other code to invoke it in UI threadDi2015NewLine            progress.updateDataGridViewValue(i);Di2015NewLine            progress.updateProgressBarValue(i);Di2015NewLine            Thread.Sleep(2000);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // When thread 1 complete its job we will set sync object to signalled state to wake up thread 2Di2015NewLine        syncEvent.Set();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void Process2(IProgress progress)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Thread 2 will stop until sync object signalledDi2015NewLine        syncEvent.WaitOne();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        for (int i = 10; i < 20; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            progress.updateProgressBarValue(i);Di2015NewLine            progress.updateDataGridViewValue(i);Di2015NewLine            Thread.Sleep(2000);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

8918233Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static DataTable ToDataTable<T>(this IEnumerable<T> source, string newTableName)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    DataTable newTable = new DataTable(newTableName);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    T firstRow = source.FirstOrDefault();Di2015NewLine    if (firstRow != null)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        PropertyInfo[] properties = firstRow.GetType().GetProperties();Di2015NewLine        foreach (PropertyInfo prop in properties)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            newTable.Columns.Add(prop.Name, prop.PropertyType);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        foreach (T element in source)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            DataRow newRow = newTable.NewRow();Di2015NewLine            foreach (PropertyInfo prop in properties)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                newRow[prop.Name] = prop.GetValue(element, null);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            newTable.Rows.Add(newRow);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return newTable;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

8918883Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic void SomeMethod(TreeNode root)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    Stack<TreeNode> nodeStack = new Stack<TreeNode>();Di2015NewLine    nodeStack.Push(root);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    while (nodeStack.Count > 0)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        TreeNode node = nodeStack.Pop();Di2015NewLine        //do something on itemDi2015NewLine        //need to push children in reverse order, so first child is pushed lastDi2015NewLine        foreach (TreeNode item in node.Nodes.Reverse())Di2015NewLine            nodeStack.Push(item);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
8918883Di2015UniqueSeparatorvisited
8918940Di2015UniqueSeparatorASP.NET MVC 3 provides a mechanism that can make a remote server call in order to validate a form field without posting the entire form to the server. This is useful when you have a field that cannot be validated on the client and is therefore likely to fail validation when the form is submitted. For example, many Web sites require you to register using a unique user ID. For popular sites, it can take several attempts to find a user ID that is not already taken, and the user's input is not considered valid until all fields are valid, including the user ID. Being able to validate remotely saves the user from having to submit the form several times before finding an available ID.

8919967Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Collections.Generic;Di2015NewLineusing System.Windows.Forms;Di2015NewLineusing System.Runtime.InteropServices;Di2015NewLineusing System.Diagnostics;Di2015NewLineusing Microsoft.Win32;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinenamespace WindowsApplicationDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    static class ProgramDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        /*Di2015NewLine    DEMO CODE ONLY: In general, this approach calls for re-thinking Di2015NewLine    your architecture!Di2015NewLine    There are 4 possible ways this can run:Di2015NewLine    1) User starts application from existing cmd window, and runs in GUI modeDi2015NewLine    2) User double clicks to start application, and runs in GUI modeDi2015NewLine    3) User starts applicaiton from existing cmd window, and runs in command modeDi2015NewLine    4) User double clicks to start application, and runs in command mode.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    To run in console mode, start a cmd shell and enter:Di2015NewLine        c:\\path\\to\\Debug\\dir\\WindowsApplication.exe consoleDi2015NewLine        To run in gui mode,  EITHER just double click the exe, OR start it from the cmd prompt with:Di2015NewLine        c:\\path\\to\\Debug\\dir\\WindowsApplication.exe (or pass the "gui" argument).Di2015NewLine        To start in command mode from a double click, change the default below to "console".Di2015NewLine    In practice, I'm not even sure how the console vs gui mode distinction would be made from aDi2015NewLine    double click...Di2015NewLine        string mode = args.Length > 0 ? args[0] : "console"; //default to consoleDi2015NewLine    */Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        [DllImport("kernel32.dll", SetLastError = true)]Di2015NewLine        static extern bool AllocConsole();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        [DllImport("kernel32.dll", SetLastError = true)]Di2015NewLine        static extern bool FreeConsole();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        [DllImport("kernel32", SetLastError = true)]Di2015NewLine        static extern bool AttachConsole(int dwProcessId);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        [DllImport("user32.dll")]Di2015NewLine        static extern IntPtr GetForegroundWindow();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        [DllImport("user32.dll", SetLastError = true)]Di2015NewLine        static extern uint GetWindowThreadProcessId(IntPtr hWnd, out int lpdwProcessId);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        [STAThread]Di2015NewLine        static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            //TODO: better handling of command args, (handle help (--help /?) etc.)Di2015NewLine            string mode = args.Length > 0 ? args[0] : "gui"; //default to guiDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (mode == "gui")Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                MessageBox.Show("Welcome to GUI mode");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                Application.EnableVisualStyles();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                Application.SetCompatibleTextRenderingDefault(false);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                Application.Run(new Form1());Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            else if (mode == "console")Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                //Get a pointer to the forground window.  The idea here is thatDi2015NewLine                //IF the user is starting our application from an existing consoleDi2015NewLine                //shell, that shell will be the uppermost window.  We'll get itDi2015NewLine                //and attach to itDi2015NewLine                IntPtr ptr = GetForegroundWindow();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                int  u;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                GetWindowThreadProcessId(ptr, out u);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                Process process = Process.GetProcessById(u);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                if (process.ProcessName == "cmd" )    //Is the uppermost window a cmd process?Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    AttachConsole(process.Id);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    //we have a console to attach to ..Di2015NewLine                    Console.WriteLine("hello. It looks like you started me from an existing console.");Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                elseDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    //no console AND we're in console mode ... create a new console.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    AllocConsole();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    Console.WriteLine(@"hello. It looks like you double clicked me to startDi2015NewLine                   AND you want console mode.  Here's a new console.");Di2015NewLine                    Console.WriteLine("press any key to continue ...");Di2015NewLine                    Console.ReadLine();       Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                FreeConsole();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

8921186Di2015UniqueSeparatorSystemFailureType

8921186Di2015UniqueSeparator[HttpPost]Di2015NewLine    public ActionResult Edit(int id, FormCollection collection, string[] selectedTypes)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        SystemFailureProblem p).Single();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // get all types joined with this problem using cross tableDi2015NewLine        var problemTypes = from x in context.xSystemFailureProblemToTypesDi2015NewLine                           join t in context.SystemFailureTypes on x.SystemFailureTypeID equals t.IDDi2015NewLine                           where x.SystemFailureProblemID == problem.IDDi2015NewLine                           select t;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        problem.FailureTypes = problemTypes.ToList<SystemFailureType>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (TryUpdateModel(problem, "", null, new string[] { "Types" }))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine 8921488Di2015UniqueSeparatorclass Auth {Di2015NewLine        const string REQUEST_TOKEN_URL = "https://twitter.com/oauth/request_token";Di2015NewLine        const string ACCESS_TOKEN_URL = "https://twitter.com/oauth/access_token";Di2015NewLine        const string AUTHORIZE_URL = "https://twitter.com/oauth/authorize";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private Random random = new Random();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public string ConsumerKey { get; private set; }Di2015NewLine        public string ConsumerSecret { get; private set; }Di2015NewLine        public string RequestToken { get; private set; }Di2015NewLine        public string RequestTokenSecret { get; private set; }Di2015NewLine        public string AccessToken { get; private set; }Di2015NewLine        public string AccessTokenSecret { get; private set; }Di2015NewLine        public string UserId { get; private set; }Di2015NewLine        public string ScreenName { get; private set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public Auth(string consumerKey, string consumerSecret) {Di2015NewLine            ServicePointManager.Expect100Continue = false;Di2015NewLine            ConsumerKey = consumerKey;Di2015NewLine            ConsumerSecret = consumerSecret;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public Auth(string consumerKey, string consumerSecret, string accessToken, string accessTokenSecret, string userId, string screenName) {Di2015NewLine            ServicePointManager.Expect100Continue = false;Di2015NewLine            ConsumerKey = consumerKey;Di2015NewLine            ConsumerSecret = consumerSecret;Di2015NewLine            AccessToken = accessToken;Di2015NewLine            AccessTokenSecret = accessTokenSecret;Di2015NewLine            UserId = userId;Di2015NewLine            ScreenName = screenName;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public void GetRequestToken() {Di2015NewLine            SortedDictionary<string, string> parameters = GenerateParameters("");Di2015NewLine            string signature = GenerateSignature("", "GET", REQUEST_TOKEN_URL, parameters);Di2015NewLine            parameters.Add("oauth_signature", UrlEncode(signature));Di2015NewLine            string response = HttpGet(REQUEST_TOKEN_URL, parameters);Di2015NewLine            Dictionary<string, string> dic = ParseResponse(response);Di2015NewLine            RequestToken = dic["oauth_token"];Di2015NewLine            RequestTokenSecret = dic["oauth_token_secret"];Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public string GetAuthorizeUrl() {Di2015NewLine            return AUTHORIZE_URL + "?oauth_token=" + RequestToken;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public void GetAccessToken(string pin) {Di2015NewLine            SortedDictionary<string, string> parameters = GenerateParameters(RequestToken);Di2015NewLine            parameters.Add("oauth_verifier", pin);Di2015NewLine            string signature = GenerateSignature(RequestTokenSecret, "GET", ACCESS_TOKEN_URL, parameters);Di2015NewLine            parameters.Add("oauth_signature", UrlEncode(signature));Di2015NewLine            string response = HttpGet(ACCESS_TOKEN_URL, parameters);Di2015NewLine            Dictionary<string, string> dic = ParseResponse(response);Di2015NewLine            AccessToken = dic["oauth_token"];Di2015NewLine            AccessTokenSecret = dic["oauth_token_secret"];Di2015NewLine            UserId = dic["user_id"];Di2015NewLine            ScreenName = dic["screen_name"];Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public string Get(string url, IDictionary<string, string> parameters) {Di2015NewLine            SortedDictionary<string, string> parameters2 = GenerateParameters(AccessToken);Di2015NewLine            foreach (var p in parameters)Di2015NewLine                parameters2.Add(p.Key, p.Value);Di2015NewLine            string signature = GenerateSignature(AccessTokenSecret, "GET", url, parameters2);Di2015NewLine            parameters2.Add("oauth_signature", UrlEncode(signature));Di2015NewLine            return HttpGet(url, parameters2);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public string Post(string url, IDictionary<string, string> parameters) {Di2015NewLine            SortedDictionary<string, string> parameters2 = GenerateParameters(AccessToken);Di2015NewLine            foreach (var p in parameters)Di2015NewLine                parameters2.Add(p.Key, p.Value);Di2015NewLine            string signature = GenerateSignature(AccessTokenSecret, "POST", url, parameters2);Di2015NewLine            parameters2.Add("oauth_signature", UrlEncode(signature));Di2015NewLine            return HttpPost(url, parameters2);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private string HttpGet(string url, IDictionary<string, string> parameters) {Di2015NewLine            WebRequest req = WebRequest.Create(url + '?' + JoinParameters(parameters));Di2015NewLine            WebResponse res = req.GetResponse();Di2015NewLine            Stream stream = res.GetResponseStream();Di2015NewLine            StreamReader reader = new StreamReader(stream);Di2015NewLine            string result = reader.ReadToEnd();Di2015NewLine            reader.Close();Di2015NewLine            stream.Close();Di2015NewLine            return result;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        string HttpPost(string url, IDictionary<string, string> parameters) {Di2015NewLine            byte[] data = Encoding.ASCII.GetBytes(JoinParameters(parameters));Di2015NewLine            WebRequest req = WebRequest.Create(url);Di2015NewLine            req.Method = "POST";Di2015NewLine            req.ContentType = "application/x-www-form-urlencoded";Di2015NewLine            req.ContentLength = data.Length;Di2015NewLine            Stream reqStream = req.GetRequestStream();Di2015NewLine            reqStream.Write(data, 0, data.Length);Di2015NewLine            reqStream.Close();Di2015NewLine            WebResponse res = req.GetResponse();Di2015NewLine            Stream resStream = res.GetResponseStream();Di2015NewLine            StreamReader reader = new StreamReader(resStream, Encoding.UTF8);Di2015NewLine            string result = reader.ReadToEnd();Di2015NewLine            reader.Close();Di2015NewLine            resStream.Close();Di2015NewLine            return result;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private Dictionary<string, string> ParseResponse(string response) {Di2015NewLine            Dictionary<string, string> result = new Dictionary<string, string>();Di2015NewLine            foreach (string s in response.Split('&')) {Di2015NewLine                int index = s.IndexOf('=');Di2015NewLine                if (index == -1)Di2015NewLine                    result.Add(s, "");Di2015NewLine                elseDi2015NewLine                    result.Add(s.Substring(0, index), s.Substring(index + 1));Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            return result;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private string JoinParameters(IDictionary<string, string> parameters) {Di2015NewLine            StringBuilder result = new StringBuilder();Di2015NewLine            bool first = true;Di2015NewLine            foreach (var parameter in parameters) {Di2015NewLine                if (first)Di2015NewLine                    first = false;Di2015NewLine                elseDi2015NewLine                    result.Append('&');Di2015NewLine                result.Append(parameter.Key);Di2015NewLine                result.Append('=');Di2015NewLine                result.Append(parameter.Value);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            return result.ToString();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private string GenerateSignature(string tokenSecret, string httpMethod, string url, SortedDictionary<string, string> parameters) {Di2015NewLine            string signatureBase = GenerateSignatureBase(httpMethod, url, parameters);Di2015NewLine            HMACSHA1 hmacsha1 = new HMACSHA1();Di2015NewLine            hmacsha1.Key = Encoding.ASCII.GetBytes(UrlEncode(ConsumerSecret) + '&' + UrlEncode(tokenSecret));Di2015NewLine            byte[] data = System.Text.Encoding.ASCII.GetBytes(signatureBase);Di2015NewLine            byte[] hash = hmacsha1.ComputeHash(data);Di2015NewLine            return Convert.ToBase64String(hash);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private string GenerateSignatureBase(string httpMethod, string url, SortedDictionary<string, string> parameters) {Di2015NewLine            StringBuilder result = new StringBuilder();Di2015NewLine            result.Append(httpMethod);Di2015NewLine            result.Append('&');Di2015NewLine            result.Append(UrlEncode(url));Di2015NewLine            result.Append('&');Di2015NewLine            result.Append(UrlEncode(JoinParameters(parameters)));Di2015NewLine            return result.ToString();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private SortedDictionary<string, string> GenerateParameters(string token) {Di2015NewLine            SortedDictionary<string, string> result = new SortedDictionary<string, string>();Di2015NewLine            result.Add("oauth_consumer_key", ConsumerKey);Di2015NewLine            result.Add("oauth_signature_method", "HMAC-SHA1");Di2015NewLine            result.Add("oauth_timestamp", GenerateTimestamp());Di2015NewLine            result.Add("oauth_nonce", GenerateNonce());Di2015NewLine            result.Add("oauth_version", "1.0");Di2015NewLine            if (!string.IsNullOrEmpty(token))Di2015NewLine                result.Add("oauth_token", token);Di2015NewLine            return result;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public string UrlEncode(string value) {Di2015NewLine            string unreserved = "abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyzABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZ0123456789-_.~";Di2015NewLine            StringBuilder result = new StringBuilder();Di2015NewLine            byte[] data = Encoding.UTF8.GetBytes(value);Di2015NewLine            foreach (byte b in data) {Di2015NewLine                if (b < 0x80 && unreserved.IndexOf((char)b) != -1)Di2015NewLine                    result.Append((char)b);Di2015NewLine                elseDi2015NewLine                    result.Append('%' + String.Format("{0:X2}", (int)b));Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            return result.ToString();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private string GenerateNonce() {Di2015NewLine            string letters = "abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyzABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZ0123456789";Di2015NewLine            StringBuilder result = new StringBuilder(8);Di2015NewLine            for (int i = 0; i < 8; ++i)Di2015NewLine                result.Append(letters[random.Next(letters.Length)]);Di2015NewLine            return result.ToString();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private string GenerateTimestamp() {Di2015NewLine            TimeSpan ts = DateTime.UtcNow - new DateTime(1970, 1, 1, 0, 0, 0, 0);Di2015NewLine            return Convert.ToInt64(ts.TotalSeconds).ToString();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

8927479Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic string ConvertToEasternArabicNumerals(string input)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        System.Text.UTF8Encoding utf8Encoder = new UTF8Encoding();Di2015NewLine        System.Text.Decoder utf8Decoder = utf8Encoder.GetDecoder();Di2015NewLine        System.Text.StringBuilder convertedChars = new System.Text.StringBuilder();Di2015NewLine        char[] convertedChar = new char[1];Di2015NewLine        byte[] bytes = new byte[] { 217, 160 };Di2015NewLine        char[] inputCharArray = input.ToCharArray();Di2015NewLine        foreach (char c in inputCharArray)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (char.IsDigit(c))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                bytes[1] = Convert.ToByte(160 + char.GetNumericValue(c));Di2015NewLine                utf8Decoder.GetChars(bytes, 0, 2, convertedChar, 0);Di2015NewLine                convertedChars.Append(convertedChar[0]);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                convertedChars.Append(c);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return convertedChars.ToString();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

8929473Di2015UniqueSeparatorApplication.Current.MainWindow
8929473Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class FlashWindowHelperDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private IntPtr mainWindowHWnd;Di2015NewLine    private Application theApp;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public FlashWindowHelper(Application app)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        this.theApp = app;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void FlashApplicationWindow()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        InitializeHandle();Di2015NewLine        Flash(this.mainWindowHWnd, 5);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void StopFlashing()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        InitializeHandle();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (Win2000OrLater)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            FLASHWINFO fi = CreateFlashInfoStruct(this.mainWindowHWnd, FLASHW_STOP, uint.MaxValue, 0);Di2015NewLine            FlashWindowEx(ref fi);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void InitializeHandle()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (this.mainWindowHWnd == IntPtr.Zero)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Delayed creation of Main Window IntPtr as Application.Current passed in to ctor does not have the MainWindow set at that timeDi2015NewLine            var mainWindow = this.theApp.MainWindow;Di2015NewLine            this.mainWindowHWnd = new System.Windows.Interop.WindowInteropHelper(mainWindow).Handle;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    [DllImport("user32.dll")]Di2015NewLine    [return: MarshalAs(UnmanagedType.Bool)]Di2015NewLine    private static extern bool FlashWindowEx(ref FLASHWINFO pwfi);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    [StructLayout(LayoutKind.Sequential)]Di2015NewLine    private struct FLASHWINFODi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// The size of the structure in bytes.Di2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        public uint cbSize;Di2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// A Handle to the Window to be Flashed. The window can be either opened or minimized.Di2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        public IntPtr hwnd;Di2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// The Flash Status.Di2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        public uint dwFlags;Di2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// The number of times to Flash the window.Di2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        public uint uCount;Di2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// The rate at which the Window is to be flashed, in milliseconds. If Zero, the function uses the default cursor blink rate.Di2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        public uint dwTimeout;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Stop flashing. The system restores the window to its original stae.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    public const uint FLASHW_STOP = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Flash the window caption.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    public const uint FLASHW_CAPTION = 1;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Flash the taskbar button.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    public const uint FLASHW_TRAY = 2;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Flash both the window caption and taskbar button.Di2015NewLine    /// This is equivalent to setting the FLASHW_CAPTION | FLASHW_TRAY flags.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    public const uint FLASHW_ALL = 3;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Flash continuously, until the FLASHW_STOP flag is set.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    public const uint FLASHW_TIMER = 4;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Flash continuously until the window comes to the foreground.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    public const uint FLASHW_TIMERNOFG = 12;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Flash the spacified Window (Form) until it recieves focus.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="hwnd"></param>Di2015NewLine    /// <returns></returns>Di2015NewLine    public static bool Flash(IntPtr hwnd)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Make sure we're running under Windows 2000 or laterDi2015NewLine        if (Win2000OrLater)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            FLASHWINFO fi = CreateFlashInfoStruct(hwnd, FLASHW_ALL | FLASHW_TIMERNOFG, uint.MaxValue, 0);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return FlashWindowEx(ref fi);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return false;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static FLASHWINFO CreateFlashInfoStruct(IntPtr handle, uint flags, uint count, uint timeout)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        FLASHWINFO fi = new FLASHWINFO();Di2015NewLine        fi.cbSize = Convert.ToUInt32(Marshal.SizeOf(fi));Di2015NewLine        fi.hwnd = handle;Di2015NewLine        fi.dwFlags = flags;Di2015NewLine        fi.uCount = count;Di2015NewLine        fi.dwTimeout = timeout;Di2015NewLine        return fi;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Flash the specified Window (form) for the specified number of 8933480Di2015UniqueSeparatorDictionary<int, int> occurrencesOfTopicsByTopicID = new Dictionary<int, int>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// The following code increments the number of occurrences of a specific topic,Di2015NewLine// identified by a variable named "idOfTopic", by one.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineint occurrences;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Try to get the current count of occurrences for this topic.Di2015NewLine// If this topic has not occurred previously,Di2015NewLine// then there might not be an entry in the dictionary.Di2015NewLineif (occurrencesOfTopicsByTopicID.TryGetValue(idOfTopic, out occurrences))Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // This topic already exists in the dictionary,Di2015NewLine    // so just update the associated occurrence count by oneDi2015NewLine    occurrencesOfTopicsByTopicID[idOfTopic] = occurrences + 1;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineelseDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // This is the first occurrence of this topic,Di2015NewLine    // so add a new entry to the dictionary with an occurrence count of one.Di2015NewLine    occurrencesOfTopicsByTopicID.Add(idOfTopic, 1);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

8934232Di2015UniqueSeparatorvoid ApplyFilter(Expression<Func<TEntity, bool>> predicate)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if(this.resultSet == null)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        this.resultSet = this.context.Set<TEntity>().AsQueryable();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    this.resultSet = this.resultSet.Where(predicate);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
8934232Di2015UniqueSeparator    public static Expression<Func<TEntity, bool>> MakeDateRange<TEntity>(DateTime? dateFrom, DateTime? dateTo)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var et = typeof(TEntity);Di2015NewLine        var param = Expression.Parameter(et, "a");Di2015NewLine        var prop = et.GetProperty("UpdatedDate");Di2015NewLine        Expression body = null, left = null, right = null;Di2015NewLine        if (prop == null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            prop = et.GetProperty("CreatedDate");Di2015NewLine            if (prop == null)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                prop = et.GetProperty("Date");Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (dateFrom.HasValue)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            left = Expression.GreaterThanOrEqual(Expression.PropertyOrField(param, prop.Name), Expression.Constant(dateFrom.GetValueOrDefault()));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (dateTo.HasValue)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            right = Expression.LessThanOrEqual(Expression.PropertyOrField(param, prop.Name), Expression.Constant(dateTo.GetValueOrDefault()));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (left != null && right != null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            body = Expression.AndAlso(left, right);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        else if (left != null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            body = left;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            body = right;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return Expression.Lambda<Func<TEntity, bool>>(body, param);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

8934916Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic sealed class TimerServiceDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    ///   This method registers a call back to be called after a specified period of time.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name = "duration">The duration after which to call back</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name = "callback">The method to call back</param>Di2015NewLine    public void WhenElapsed(TimeSpan duration, Action callback)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (callback == null) throw new ArgumentNullException("callback");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //Set up state to allow cleanup after timer completesDi2015NewLine        var timerState = new TimerState(callback);Di2015NewLine        var timer = new Timer(OnTimerElapsed, timerState, Timeout.Infinite, Timeout.Infinite);Di2015NewLine        timerState.Timer = timer;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //Start the timerDi2015NewLine        timer.Change((int)duration.TotalMilliseconds, Timeout.Infinite);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void OnTimerElapsed(Object state)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var timerState = (TimerState)state;Di2015NewLine        timerState.Timer.Dispose();Di2015NewLine        timerState.Callback();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private sealed class TimerStateDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        public TimerState(Action callback)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Callback = callback;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public Timer Timer { get; set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public Action Callback { get; private set; }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

8941022Di2015UniqueSeparatorSentTaskCore
8941022Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate static Task<PingReply> SendTaskCore(Ping ping, object userToken, Action<TaskCompletionSource<PingReply>> sendAsync)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Validate we're being used with a real smtpClient.  The rest of the arg validationDi2015NewLine        // will happen in the call to sendAsync.Di2015NewLine        if (ping == null) throw new ArgumentNullException("ping");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Create a TaskCompletionSource to represent the operationDi2015NewLine        var tcs = new TaskCompletionSource<PingReply>(userToken);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Register a handler that will transfer completion results to the TCS TaskDi2015NewLine        PingCompletedEventHandler handler = null;Di2015NewLine        handler = (sender, e) => EAPCommon.HandleCompletion(tcs, e, () => e.Reply, () => ping.PingCompleted -= handler);Di2015NewLine        ping.PingCompleted += handler;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Try to start the async operation.  If starting it fails (due to parameter validation)Di2015NewLine        // unregister the handler before allowing the exception to propagate.Di2015NewLine        tryDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            sendAsync(tcs);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        catch(Exception exc)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            ping.PingCompleted -= handler;Di2015NewLine            tcs.TrySetException(exc);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Return the task to represent the asynchronous operationDi2015NewLine        return tcs.Task;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

8945152Di2015UniqueSeparatorUpdater A checks if its the newest versionDi2015NewLineIf launcher isnt the newest versionDi2015NewLine    Download the differences (to save bandwidth) to file BDi2015NewLine    Apply the delta to own code into file CDi2015NewLine    Launch file C.Di2015NewLine    CloseDi2015NewLineIf file C exists (update happened recently)Di2015NewLine    Try to delete C  (update was previous launch, delete temporary file)Di2015NewLine    If delete fails  (We are C, means A is out of date)Di2015NewLine        Copy C over A  (update launcher)Di2015NewLine        Note that you can keep going, don't have to restart even though we are C.Di2015NewLineIf game isnt newest versionDi2015NewLine    Download the differences (to save bandwidth) to file BDi2015NewLine    Apply the delta to game into file DDi2015NewLine    delete gameDi2015NewLine    Rename D -> gameDi2015NewLineRun gameDi2015NewLine

8946214Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic bool SetAcl()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    FileSystemRights Rights = (FileSystemRights)0;Di2015NewLine    Rights = FileSystemRights.FullControl;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // *** Add Access Rule to the actual directory itselfDi2015NewLine    FileSystemAccessRule AccessRule = new FileSystemAccessRule("Users", Rights,Di2015NewLine                                InheritanceFlags.None,Di2015NewLine                                PropagationFlags.NoPropagateInherit,Di2015NewLine                                AccessControlType.Allow);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    DirectoryInfo Info = new DirectoryInfo(destinationDirectory);Di2015NewLine    DirectorySecurity Security = Info.GetAccessControl(AccessControlSections.Access);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    bool Result = false;Di2015NewLine    Security.ModifyAccessRule(AccessControlModification.Set, AccessRule, out Result);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (!Result)Di2015NewLine        return false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // *** Always allow objects to inherit on a directoryDi2015NewLine    InheritanceFlags iFlags = InheritanceFlags.ObjectInherit;Di2015NewLine    iFlags = InheritanceFlags.ContainerInherit | InheritanceFlags.ObjectInherit;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // *** Add Access rule for the inheritanceDi2015NewLine    AccessRule = new FileSystemAccessRule("Users", Rights,Di2015NewLine                                iFlags,Di2015NewLine                                PropagationFlags.InheritOnly,Di2015NewLine                                AccessControlType.Allow);Di2015NewLine    Result = false;Di2015NewLine    Security.ModifyAccessRule(AccessControlModification.Add, AccessRule, out Result);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (!Result)Di2015NewLine        return false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Info.SetAccessControl(Security);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return true;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

8946506Di2015UniqueSeparator1. 13 goes into   7 0 times with remainder  7; bring down a 0.Di2015NewLine2. 13 goes into  70 5 times with remainder  5; bring down a 0.Di2015NewLine3. 13 goes into  50 3 times with remainder 11; bring down a 0.Di2015NewLine4. 13 goes into 110 8 times with remainder  6; bring down a 0.Di2015NewLine5. 13 goes into  60 4 times with remainder  8; bring down a 0.Di2015NewLine6. 13 goes into  80 6 times with remainder  2; bring down a 0.Di2015NewLine7. 13 goes into  20 1 time  with remainder  7; bring down a 0.Di2015NewLine8. 8946570Di2015UniqueSeparatorclass Xml2AdressConverter : IValueConverterDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public object Convert(object value, Type targetType, object parameter, System.Globalization.CultureInfo culture)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        XmlElement xmlElt = value as XmlElement;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (xmlElt != null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            string str, attName;Di2015NewLine            XElement xElt;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            attName = parameter as string;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            xElt= XElement.Load(xmlElt.CreateNavigator().ReadSubtree());Di2015NewLine            str = "";Di2015NewLine            foreach (XElement x in xElt.Descendants(attName))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                 str = x.Value;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            return str;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return "";Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public object ConvertBack(object value, Type targetType, object parameter, System.Globalization.CultureInfo culture)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        throw new NotImplementedException();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

8949322Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class Range<TValue> Di2015NewLine    where TValue : IComparable<TValue>Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public TValue Min { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    public TValue Max { get; set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public Range(TValue min, TValue max)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        this.Min = min;Di2015NewLine        this.Max = max;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class RangeComparer<TValue> : IRangeComparer<Range<TValue>, TValue> Di2015NewLine    where TValue : IComparable<TValue>Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Returns 0 if value is in the specified range;Di2015NewLine    /// less than 0 if value is above the range;Di2015NewLine    /// greater than 0 if value is below the range.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    public int Compare(Range<TValue> range, TValue value)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Check if value is below range (less than min).Di2015NewLine        if (range.Min.CompareTo(value) > 0)Di2015NewLine            return 1;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Check if value is above range (greater than max)Di2015NewLine        if (range.Max.CompareTo(value) < 0)Di2015NewLine            return -1;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Value is within range.Di2015NewLine        return 0;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinestatic void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var ranges = new Range<int>[]Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        new Range<int>(1, 10000),Di2015NewLine        new Range<int>(10001, 40000),Di2015NewLine        new Range<int>(40001, int.MaxValue),Di2015NewLine    };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var rangeComparer = new RangeComparer<int>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine(BinarySearch(ranges, 7, rangeComparer));       // gives 0Di2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine(BinarySearch(ranges, 10007, rangeComparer));   // gives 1Di2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine(BinarySearch(ranges, 40007, rangeComparer));   // gives 2Di2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine(BinarySearch(ranges, 1, rangeComparer));       // gives 0Di2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine(BinarySearch(ranges, 10000, rangeComparer));   // gives 0Di2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine(BinarySearch(ranges, 40000, rangeComparer));   // gives 1Di2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine(BinarySearch(ranges, 40001, rangeComparer));   // gives 2Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

8950436Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic partial class Animation : FormDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    Image img1 = Properties.Resources.img1;Di2015NewLine    Image img2 = Properties.Resources.img2;Di2015NewLine    Image img3 = Properties.Resources.img3;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    List<Image> images = new List<Image>();Di2015NewLine    Timer timer = new Timer();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public Animation()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        InitializeComponent();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        timer.Interval = 250;Di2015NewLine        timer.Tick += new EventHandler(timer_Tick);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        images.Add(img1);Di2015NewLine        images.Add(img2);Di2015NewLine        images.Add(img3);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        animated_pbx.Image = img1;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void timer_Tick(object sender, EventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (this.InvokeRequired)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            this.BeginInvoke(new EventHandler(timer_Tick));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Loop through the images unless we've reached the final one, in that case stop the timerDi2015NewLine            Image currentImage = animated_pbx.Image;Di2015NewLine            int currentIndex = images.IndexOf(currentImage);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (currentIndex < images.Count - 1)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                currentIndex++;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                animated_pbx.Image = images[currentIndex];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                animated_pbx.Invalidate();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                timer.Stop();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void animated_pbx_MouseEnter(object sender, EventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        timer.Start();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void animated_pbx_MouseLeave(object sender, EventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        timer.Stop();Di2015NewLine        animated_pbx.Image = img1;Di2015NewLine        animated_pbx.Invalidate();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

8956975Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static string Subscript(this string normal)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if(normal == null) return normal;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var res = new StringBuilder();Di2015NewLine    foreach(var c in normal)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        char c1 = c;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // I'm not quite sure if char.IsDigit(c) returns true for, for example, '³',Di2015NewLine        // so I'm using the safe approach hereDi2015NewLine        if (c >= '0' && c <= '9')Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // 0x208x is the unicode offset of the subscripted number charactersDi2015NewLine            c1 = (char)(c - '0' + 0x2080);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        res.Append(c1);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return res.ToString();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
8956991Di2015UniqueSeparatorstring strFunctionName = "MyFunction";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// get the type containing the methodDi2015NewLineType t = Type.GetType("Foo.Bar.SomeTypeContainingYourFunction");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// you will need an instance of the type if the method you areDi2015NewLine// trying to invoke is not static. If it is static you could leave that nullDi2015NewLineobject instance = Activator.CreateInstance(t);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// the arguments that your method expectsDi2015NewLinenew object[] arguments = new object[] { 1, "foo", false };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// invoke the methodDi2015NewLineobject result = t.InvokeMember(Di2015NewLine    strFunctionName, Di2015NewLine    BindingFlags.InvokeMethod, Di2015NewLine    null, Di2015NewLine    instance, Di2015NewLine    argumentsDi2015NewLine);Di2015NewLine
8956991Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Reflection;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinenamespace Foo.BarDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public class SomeTypeContainingYourFunctionDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        public string MyFunction(int foo, string bar, bool baz)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return string.Format("foo: {0}, bar: {1}, baz: {2}", foo, bar, baz);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinenamespace BazingaDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    class ProgramDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        static void Main()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var strFunctionName = "MyFunction";Di2015NewLine            var t = Type.GetType("Foo.Bar.SomeTypeContainingYourFunction");Di2015NewLine            var instance = Activator.CreateInstance(t);Di2015NewLine            var arguments = new object[] { 1, "foo", false };Di2015NewLine            var result = t.InvokeMember(Di2015NewLine                strFunctionName, Di2015NewLine                BindingFlags.InvokeMethod, Di2015NewLine                null, Di2015NewLine                instance, Di2015NewLine                argumentsDi2015NewLine            );Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine(result);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

8958253Di2015UniqueSeparatorint[] Count(string s) {Di2015NewLine    int[] res = new int[256];Di2015NewLine    foreach (var c in s) {Di2015NewLine        res[c]++;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return res;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineint ShortInLong(string ss, string ls) {Di2015NewLine    var sc = Count(ss);Di2015NewLine    var lc = Count(ls);Di2015NewLine    int res = int.MaxValue;Di2015NewLine    foreach (var c in ss) {Di2015NewLine        int d = lc[c] / sc[c]; // sc[c] is never 0 because of the way we constructed itDi2015NewLine        res = Math.Min(res, d);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return res;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

8958500Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static class QueryExtensionsDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public static IQueryable<TEntity> WhereIn<TEntity, TValue>Di2015NewLine    (Di2015NewLine        this ObjectQuery<TEntity> query,Di2015NewLine        Expression<Func<TEntity, TValue>> selector,Di2015NewLine        IEnumerable<TValue> collectionDi2015NewLine    )Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        ParameterExpression p = selector.Parameters.Single();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //if there are no elements to the WHERE clause,Di2015NewLine        //we want no matches:Di2015NewLine        if (!collection.Any()) return query.Where(x=>false);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (collection.Count() > 3000) //could move this value to configDi2015NewLine            throw new ArgumentException("Collection too large - execution will cause stack overflow", "collection");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        IEnumerable<Expression> equals = collection.Select(value =>Di2015NewLine           (Expression)Expression.Equal(selector.Body,Di2015NewLine                Expression.Constant(value, typeof(TValue))));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Expression body = equals.Aggregate((accumulate, equal) =>Di2015NewLine            Expression.Or(accumulate, equal));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return query.Where(Expression.Lambda<Func<TEntity, bool>>(body, p));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //raw resultDi2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine(xmlResult);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // use the Result classDi2015NewLine        if (result.status == }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine[XmlRoot(ElementName="result")]Di2015NewLinepublic class ResultDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    static XmlSerializer ser = new XmlSerializer(typeof(Result) , 8963451Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Threading;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineclass TestLoopsDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    const int targetFPS = 5;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        bool _continue = true;Di2015NewLine        DateTime _last = DateTime.MinValue;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        while (_continue)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (Console.KeyAvailable)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                ConsoleKeyInfo cki = Console.ReadKey(true);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                if (cki.Key == ConsoleKey.Q)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    Console.WriteLine("\\n'Q' was pressed.");Di2015NewLine                    _continue = false;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                if (cki.Key == ConsoleKey.P)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    Console.WriteLine("\\n'P' was pressed; press 'R' to resume.");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    // Block until 'R' is pressed.Di2015NewLine                    while (Console.ReadKey(true).Key != ConsoleKey.R)Di2015NewLine                        ; // Do nothing.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    Console.WriteLine("'R' was pressed.");Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            DateTime _current = DateTime.Now;Di2015NewLine            if (_current - _last > TimeSpan.FromMilliseconds(1000F / targetFPS))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                _last = _current;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // Do something...Di2015NewLine                Console.Write(".");Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                System.Threading.Thread.Sleep(10);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }        Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

8971801Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class NumberedSectionComparer : IComparer<string>Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  private int Compare(string[] x, string[]y)Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    if(x.Length > y.Length)Di2015NewLine      return -Compare(y, x);//saves needing separate logic.Di2015NewLine    for(int i = 0; i != x.Length; ++i)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      int cmp = int.Parse(x[i]).CompareTo(int.Parse(y[i]));Di2015NewLine      if(cmp != 0)Di2015NewLine        return cmp;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return x.Length == y.Length ? 0 : -1;Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine  public int Compare(string x, string y)Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    if(x == null)Di2015NewLine      return y == null ? 0 : -1;Di2015NewLine    if(y == null)Di2015NewLine      return 1;Di2015NewLine    if(ReferenceEquals(x, y))//short-cutDi2015NewLine      return 0;Di2015NewLine    tryDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      return Compare(x.Split('.'), y.Split('.'));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    catch(FormatException)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      throw new ArgumentException();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

8975825Di2015UniqueSeparatorvar example = new string[]{"c", "a", "d", "b"};Di2015NewLinevar comparer = new CustomStringComparer(StringComparer.CurrentCulture);Di2015NewLineArray.Sort(example, comparer);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine...Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineclass CustomStringComparer : IComparer<string>Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private readonly IComparer<string> _baseComparer;Di2015NewLine    public CustomStringComparer(IComparer<string> baseComparer)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        _baseComparer = baseComparer;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public int Compare(string x, string y)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (_baseComparer.Compare(x, y) == 0)Di2015NewLine            return 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // "b" comes before everything elseDi2015NewLine        if (_baseComparer.Compare(x, "b") == 0)Di2015NewLine            return -1;Di2015NewLine        if (_baseComparer.Compare(y, "b") == 0)Di2015NewLine            return 1;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // "c" comes nextDi2015NewLine        if (_baseComparer.Compare(x, "c") == 0)Di2015NewLine            return -1;Di2015NewLine        if (_baseComparer.Compare(y, "c") == 0)Di2015NewLine            return 1;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return _baseComparer.Compare(x, y);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

8976073Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static ReadOnlyCollection<string> GetProductsByCategory(string category)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var results = new List<string>();Di2015NewLine    var settings = new XmlReaderSettingsDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        IgnoreWhitespace = true,Di2015NewLine        IgnoreComments = true,Di2015NewLine    };Di2015NewLine    using (var reader = XmlReader.Create(GetProductsReader(), settings))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        reader.MoveToContent();Di2015NewLine        reader.ReadStartElement("Products");Di2015NewLine        doDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (reader.IsStartElement("product"))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (reader.MoveToFirstAttribute())Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    string currentCategory = null;Di2015NewLine                    string currentName = null;Di2015NewLine                    doDi2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        switch (reader.Name)Di2015NewLine                        {Di2015NewLine                        case "category":Di2015NewLine                            currentCategory = reader.ReadContentAsString();Di2015NewLine                            break;Di2015NewLine                        case "name":Di2015NewLine                            currentName = reader.ReadContentAsString();Di2015NewLine                            break;Di2015NewLine                        }Di2015NewLine                    } while (reader.MoveToNextAttribute());Di2015NewLine                    if (currentCategory == category && currentName != null)Di2015NewLine                        results.Add(currentName);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        } while (reader.ReadToNextSibling("product"));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return new ReadOnlyCollection<string>(results);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

8976440Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic void CopyTo(this object source, object target)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // Argument-checking here...Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Collect compatible properties and source valuesDi2015NewLine    var tuples = from sourceProperty in source.GetType().GetProperties()Di2015NewLine                 join targetProperty in target.GetType().GetProperties() Di2015NewLine                                     on sourceProperty.Name Di2015NewLine                                     equals targetProperty.NameDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                 // Exclude indexersDi2015NewLine                 where !sourceProperty.GetIndexParameters().Any()Di2015NewLine                    && !targetProperty.GetIndexParameters().Any()Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                 // Must be able to read from source and write to target.Di2015NewLine                 where sourceProperty.CanRead && targetProperty.CanWriteDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                 // Property types must be compatible.Di2015NewLine                 where targetProperty.PropertyTypeDi2015NewLine                                     .IsAssignableFrom(sourceProperty.PropertyType)Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                 select newDi2015NewLine                 {Di2015NewLine                     Value = sourceProperty.GetValue(source, null),Di2015NewLine                     Property = targetPropertyDi2015NewLine                 };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Copy values over to target.Di2015NewLine    foreach (var valuePropertyTuple in tuples)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        valuePropertyTuple.PropertyDi2015NewLine                          .SetValue(target, valuePropertyTuple.Value, null);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

8978540Di2015UniqueSeparatorThe following examples use the six SQL Server system functions that return current date and time to return the date, time or both. The values are returned in series; therefore, their fractional seconds might be different.Di2015NewLineA. Getting the current system date and timeDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineSELECT 'SYSDATETIME()      ', SYSDATETIME();Di2015NewLineSELECT 'SYSDATETIMEOFFSET()', SYSDATETIMEOFFSET();Di2015NewLineSELECT 'SYSUTCDATETIME()   ', SYSUTCDATETIME();Di2015NewLineSELECT 'CURRENT_TIMESTAMP  ', CURRENT_TIMESTAMP;Di2015NewLineSELECT 'GETDATE()          ', GETDATE();Di2015NewLineSELECT 'GETUTCDATE()       ', GETUTCDATE();Di2015NewLine/* Returned:Di2015NewLineSYSDATETIME()            2007-05-03 18:34:11.9351421Di2015NewLineSYSDATETIMEOFFSET()      2007-05-03 18:34:11.9351421 -07:00Di2015NewLineSYSUTCDATETIME()         2007-05-04 01:34:11.9351421Di2015NewLineCURRENT_TIMESTAMP        2007-05-03 18:34:11.933Di2015NewLineGETDATE()                2007-05-03 18:34:11.933Di2015NewLineGETUTCDATE()             2007-05-04 01:34:11.933Di2015NewLine*/Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineB. Getting the current system dateDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineSELECT 'SYSDATETIME()      ', CONVERT (date, SYSDATETIME());Di2015NewLineSELECT 'SYSDATETIMEOFFSET()', CONVERT (date, SYSDATETIMEOFFSET());Di2015NewLineSELECT 'SYSUTCDATETIME()   ', CONVERT (date, SYSUTCDATETIME());Di2015NewLineSELECT 'CURRENT_TIMESTAMP  ', CONVERT (date, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP);Di2015NewLineSELECT 'GETDATE()          ', CONVERT (date, GETDATE());Di2015NewLineSELECT 'GETUTCDATE()       ', CONVERT (date, GETUTCDATE());Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine/* Returned: Di2015NewLineSYSDATETIME()            2007-05-03Di2015NewLineSYSDATETIMEOFFSET()      2007-05-03Di2015NewLineSYSUTCDATETIME()         2007-05-04Di2015NewLineCURRENT_TIMESTAMP        2007-05-03Di2015NewLineGETDATE()                2007-05-03Di2015NewLineGETUTCDATE()             2007-05-04Di2015NewLine*/Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineC. Getting the current system timeDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineSELECT 'SYSDATETIME()      ', CONVERT (time, SYSDATETIME());Di2015NewLineSELECT 'SYSDATETIMEOFFSET()', CONVERT (time, SYSDATETIMEOFFSET());Di2015NewLineSELECT 'SYSUTCDATETIME()   ', CONVERT (time, SYSUTCDATETIME());Di2015NewLineSELECT 'CURRENT_TIMESTAMP  ', CONVERT (time, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP);Di2015NewLineSELECT 'GETDATE()          ', CONVERT (time, GETDATE());Di2015NewLineSELECT 'GETUTCDATE()       ', CONVERT (time, GETUTCDATE());Di2015NewLine/* ReturnedDi2015NewLineSYSDATETIME()            18:25:01.6958841Di2015NewLineSYSDATETIMEOFFSET()      18:25:01.6958841Di2015NewLineSYSUTCDATETIME()         01:25:01.6958841Di2015NewLineCURRENT_TIMESTAMP        18:25:01.6930000Di2015NewLineGETDATE()                18:25:01.6930000Di2015NewLineGETUTCDATE()             01:25:01.6930000Di2015NewLine*/Di2015NewLine

8978567Di2015UniqueSeparatorhistogram
8978567Di2015UniqueSeparatorimport ImageChopsDi2015NewLineimport math, operatorDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLinedef rmsdiff(im1, im2):Di2015NewLine    "Calculate the root-mean-square difference between two images"Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    h = ImageChops.difference(im1, im2).histogram()Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    # calculate rmsDi2015NewLine    return math.sqrt(reduce(operator.add,Di2015NewLine        map(lambda h, i: h*(i**2), h, range(256))Di2015NewLine    ) / (float(im1.size[0]) * im1.size[1]))Di2015NewLine

8980646Di2015UniqueSeparatorif (y2-y1)<0:Di2015NewLine x=(CH/2 -y1)/V +x1     10 for your example. ORDi2015NewLineif (y2-y1)>0:Di2015NewLine x=(H-CH/2 -y1)/V +x1   270 for your exampleDi2015NewLineelse (that is: y2==y1)Di2015NewLine the upper or lower lines were not hit.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineif CH/2 <= x <= W-CH/2 the circle did hit the that upper or lower side: since V>0, we use x=270 and that is within CH/2 and W-CH/2. Di2015NewLine
8980646Di2015UniqueSeparator(if (x2-x1)<0)Di2015NewLine y=(CH/2 -x1)*V +y1   Di2015NewLine(if (x2-x1)>0)Di2015NewLine y=(W-CH/2 -x1)*V +y1 Di2015NewLineelse (that is: x2==x1)Di2015NewLine the side lines were not hit.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineif CH/2 <= y <= H-CH/2 the circle did hit that side at that y.Di2015NewLine
8980646Di2015UniqueSeparatormethod returning a pair of doubles    getzy(x1,y1,W,H,CH){Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  if (y2!=y1){ // test for hitting upper or lower edgesDi2015NewLine    Vinverse=(x2-x1)/(y2-y1)Di2015NewLine    if ((y2-y1)<0){Di2015NewLine       xout=(CH/2 -y1)*Vinverse +x1 Di2015NewLine       if (CH/2 <= y <= H-CH/2) {Di2015NewLine           yout=CH/2Di2015NewLine           return xout,youtDi2015NewLine       }Di2015NewLine     }Di2015NewLine    if ((y2-y1)>0){Di2015NewLine       xout=(H-CH/2 -y1)*Vinverse +x1 Di2015NewLine       if (CH/2 <= y <= H-CH/2) {Di2015NewLine           yout=H-CH/2Di2015NewLine           return xout,youtDi2015NewLine       }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine  }     Di2015NewLine  // reaching here means upper or lower lines were not hit.Di2015NewLine  if (x2!=x1){ // test for hitting upper or lower edgesDi2015NewLine    V=(y2-y1)/(x2-x1)Di2015NewLine    if ((x2-x1)<0){Di2015NewLine       yout=(CH/2 -x1)*V +y1 Di2015NewLine       if (CH/2 <= x <= W-CH/2) {Di2015NewLine           xout=CH/2Di2015NewLine           return xout,youtDi2015NewLine       }Di2015NewLine     }Di2015NewLine    if ((x2-x1)>0){Di2015NewLine       yout=(H-CH/2 -x1)*V +y1 Di2015NewLine       if (CH/2 <= x <= W-CH/2) {Di2015NewLine           xout=H-CH/2Di2015NewLine           return xout,youtDi2015NewLine       }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine  }     Di2015NewLine  // if you reach here that means the circle does not move...Di2015NewLine   deal with using exceptions or some other way.Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

8982573Di2015UniqueSeparatorclass ProgramDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        AutoMapper.Mapper.CreateMap<ParentSource, ParentDestination>().ConvertUsing<CustomTypeConverter>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        ParentSource ps = new ParentSource() { parentId = Guid.NewGuid() };Di2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class ParentDestinationDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public ParentDestination()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        children = new HashSet<ChildDestination>();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    public Guid parentId { get; 8983492Di2015UniqueSeparator    public static class StringExtensionsDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        public static byte[] ToByteArray(this string str)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            char[] arr = str.ToCharArray();Di2015NewLine            byte[] byteArr = new byte[arr.Length];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            for (int i=0; i<arr.Length; ++i)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                switch (arr[i])Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    case '0': byteArr[i] = 0; break;Di2015NewLine                    case '1': byteArr[i] = 1; break;Di2015NewLine                    default: throw new Exception(arr[i]+" is not 0 or 1.");Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return byteArr;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

8983692Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineclass PDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  static void Main()Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine      Func<double, Func<double, double>> powerFunctionGenerator = Di2015NewLine          baseNumber => exponent => Math.Pow(baseNumber, exponent);  Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      Func<double, double> powerOfTwo = powerFunctionGenerator(2.0);Di2015NewLine      Func<double, double> powerOfThree = powerFunctionGenerator(3.0);Di2015NewLine      double power2 = powerOfTwo(10.0); Di2015NewLine      double power3 = powerOfThree(10.0);Di2015NewLine      Console.WriteLine(power2); Di2015NewLine      Console.WriteLine(power3);Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

8983717Di2015UniqueSeparator// Needs argument-checking, but you'll need another method to do it eagerly.Di2015NewLinepublic static IEnumerable<List<T>> GroupByConsective<T>Di2015NewLine      (this IEnumerable<T> source, Func<T, T, bool> prevNextPredicate)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var currentGroup = new List<T>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    foreach (var item in source)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (!currentGroup.Any() || prevNextPredicate(currentGroup.Last(), item))Di2015NewLine            currentGroup.Add(item); // Append: empty group or nearby elements.Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // The group is done: yield it outDi2015NewLine            // and create a fresh group with the item.Di2015NewLine            yield return currentGroup;Di2015NewLine            currentGroup = new List<T> { item };Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   // If the group still has items once the source is fully consumed,Di2015NewLine   // we need to yield it out.Di2015NewLine   if(currentGroup.Any())Di2015NewLine     yield return currentGroup;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

8985348Di2015UniqueSeparatorWITH cte(Url, Level, Path, PostID, ParentPostID, Sequence)Di2015NewLineAS (Di2015NewLine    SELECT REPLACE(LOWER(Title), ' ', '-'), 1 AS Level, CAST(PostID as nvarchar(MAX)) as Path,Di2015NewLine    PostID, ParentPostID, right(replicate('0', 8) + cast(PostID as varchar(max)), 8)Di2015NewLine    FROM PostDi2015NewLine    WHERE ParentPostID IS NULLDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    UNION ALLDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    SELECT cte.Url, cte.Level + 1,Di2015NewLine    LOWER(cte.Path + '-' +  CAST(P.PostID AS VARCHAR(MAX))),Di2015NewLine    P.PostID,  P.ParentPostID, cte.sequence + right(replicate('0', 8) + cast(p.PostID as varchar(max)), 8)Di2015NewLine    FROM Post P Di2015NewLine    INNER JOIN cte ON P.ParentPostID = cte.PostIDDi2015NewLine)Di2015NewLineselect Url, Level, Path, PostID, ParentPostIDDi2015NewLinefrom cteDi2015NewLineorder by SequenceDi2015NewLine

8986804Di2015UniqueSeparatorList<Animal> animals = new List<Animal>();Di2015NewLineanimals.Add(garfield as Animal);Di2015NewLineanimals.Add(lassie as Animal);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine//if you do not cast, you cannot access fields that were specific to the derived class.Di2015NewLineConsole.WriteLine(animals[0].height);   //this is valid. Prints Garfield's heightDi2015NewLineConsole.WriteLine(animals[0].somethingSpecificToCat); //invalid since you haven't castedDi2015NewLineConsole.WriteLine((animals[0] as Cat).somethingSpecificToCat); //now it is validDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine//if you want to do it in a loopDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineforeach(Animal animal in animals)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    //GetType() returns the derived class that the particular animal was casted FROM earlierDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if(animal is Cat)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        //the animal is a catDi2015NewLine        Cat garfield = animal as Cat;Di2015NewLine        garfield.height;Di2015NewLine        garfield.somethingSpecificToCat;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    else if (animal is Dog)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        //animal is a dogDi2015NewLine        Dog lassie = animal as Dog;Di2015NewLine        lassie.height;Di2015NewLine        lassie.somethingSpecificToDog;Di2015NewLine    }   Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

8987189Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic byte[] ToByteArray(bool[] input)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (values.Length % 8 != 0)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        throw new ArgumentException("input");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    byte[] ret = new byte[input.Length / 8];Di2015NewLine    for (int i = 0; i < input.Length; i += 8)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int value = 0;Di2015NewLine        for (int j = 0; j < 8; j++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (input[i + j])Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                value += 1 << (7 - j);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        ret[i / 8] = (byte) value;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return ret;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
