8994932Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static string SerializeToXml<T>(T obj, PropertyInfo[] fields = null)Di2015NewLine    where T : ITableDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    Type type = typeof(T);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    IEnumerable<PropertyInfo> ignoredProperties;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (fields == null)Di2015NewLine        ignoredProperties = Enumerable.Empty<PropertyInfo>();Di2015NewLine    elseDi2015NewLine        ignoredProperties = type.GetProperties(Di2015NewLine            BindingFlags.Public | BindingFlags.Instance)Di2015NewLine            .Except(fields);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var ignoredAttrs = new XmlAttributes { XmlIgnore = true };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var attrOverrides = new XmlAttributeOverrides();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    foreach (var ignoredProperty in ignoredProperties)Di2015NewLine        attrOverrides.Add(type, ignoredProperty.Name, ignoredAttrs);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var serializer = new XmlSerializer(type, attrOverrides);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    using (var writer = new StringWriter())Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        serializer.Serialize(writer, obj);Di2015NewLine        return writer.ToString();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

8998161Di2015UniqueSeparatorint[,] array2d = ...;Di2015NewLinevar rows = array2d.GetLength(0);Di2015NewLinevar cols = array2d.GetLength(1);Di2015NewLinevar array1d = new int[rows * cols];Di2015NewLinevar current = 0;Di2015NewLinefor (int i = 0; i < rows; i++)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    for (int j = 0; j < cols; j++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        array1d[current++] = array2d[i, j];Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

8998358Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class WebClientProgressManager : INotifyPropertyChangedDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            private readonly Dictionary<WebClient,int> _clients = new Dictionary<WebClient, int>();Di2015NewLine            private const string TotalProgressPropertyName = "TotalProgress";Di2015NewLine            public void Add(WebClient client)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (client == null)Di2015NewLine                    throw new ArgumentNullException("client");Di2015NewLine                if (_clients.ContainsKey(client)) return;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                client.DownloadProgressChanged += (s, e) =>Di2015NewLine                                                      {Di2015NewLine                                                          if (e.ProgressPercentage == 100)Di2015NewLine                                                          {Di2015NewLine                                                              _clients.Remove((WebClient)s);Di2015NewLine                                                          }Di2015NewLine                                                          RaisePropertyChanged(TotalProgressPropertyName);Di2015NewLine                                                      };Di2015NewLine                _clients.Add(client,0);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            private void RaisePropertyChanged(string propertyName)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (PropertyChanged != null)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    PropertyChanged.Invoke(this,new PropertyChangedEventArgs(propertyName));Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            public int TotalProgressDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                getDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    if (_clients.Count == 0) return 100; 8999237Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic Bitmap CropImage (Bitmap image)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    int top = 0;Di2015NewLine    int bottom = image.Height-1;Di2015NewLine    int left = 0;Di2015NewLine    int right = image.Width-1;Di2015NewLine    while(left < right && CheckColIfWhite(image,left))Di2015NewLine         left++;Di2015NewLine    if(left==right) return null; //Entirely whiteDi2015NewLine    while(CheckColIfWhite(image,right)) //Because left stopped, we know right will alsoDi2015NewLine         right--;Di2015NewLine    while(CheckRowIfWhite(image,top))Di2015NewLine         top++;Di2015NewLine    while(CheckRowIfWhite(image,bottom))Di2015NewLine         bottom--;Di2015NewLine    return CropImage(image,new Rectangle(left,top,right-left+1,bottom-top+1));Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

8999316Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Collections;Di2015NewLineusing System.IO;Di2015NewLineusing System.Xml;Di2015NewLineusing System.Xml.Serialization;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic static class ProgramDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    static void Main()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // the loop here is from your commentDi2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < 10000000; i++) { ToXMLString("test", string.Format("test")); Console.WriteLine(i); }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // why is this Hashtable? due to the threading semantics!Di2015NewLine    private static readonly Hashtable serializerCache = new Hashtable();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static string ToXMLString(object obj, string nodeName)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (obj == null) throw new ArgumentNullException("obj");Di2015NewLine        Type type = obj.GetType();Di2015NewLine        var cacheKey = new { Type = type, Name = nodeName };Di2015NewLine        XmlSerializer xmlSerializer = (XmlSerializer)serializerCache[cacheKey];Di2015NewLine        if (xmlSerializer == null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            lock (serializerCache)Di2015NewLine            { // double-checkedDi2015NewLine                xmlSerializer = (XmlSerializer)serializerCache[cacheKey];Di2015NewLine                if (xmlSerializer == null)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    xmlSerializer = new XmlSerializer(type, new XmlRootAttribute(nodeName));Di2015NewLine                    serializerCache.Add(cacheKey, xmlSerializer);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        tryDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            StringWriter sw = new StringWriter();Di2015NewLine            using (XmlWriter writer = XmlWriter.Create(sw,Di2015NewLine                new XmlWriterSettings() { OmitXmlDeclaration = true, Indent = true }))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // Don't include XML namespaceDi2015NewLine                XmlSerializerNamespaces xmlnsEmpty = new XmlSerializerNamespaces();Di2015NewLine                xmlnsEmpty.Add("", "");Di2015NewLine                xmlSerializer.Serialize(writer, obj, xmlnsEmpty);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            return sw.ToString();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        catch (Exception ex)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Console.Error.WriteLine(ex.Message);Di2015NewLine            throw;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

8999698Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate readonly object _lock = new object();Di2015NewLineprivate readonly Queue<Item> _queue = new Queue<Item>();Di2015NewLineprivate readonly AutoResetEvent _signal = new AutoResetEvent();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinevoid ProducerThread()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    while (ShouldRun) Di2015NewLine    { Di2015NewLine        Item item = GetNextItem();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // you need to make sure onlyDi2015NewLine        // one thread can access the listDi2015NewLine        // at a timeDi2015NewLine        lock (_lock)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            _queue.Enqueue(item);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // notify the waiting threadDi2015NewLine        _signal.Set();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
8999698Di2015UniqueSeparatorvoid ConsumerThread()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    while (ShouldRun)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // wait to be notifiedDi2015NewLine        _signal.Wait();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Item item = null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        doDi2015NewLine        { Di2015NewLine           item = null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine           // fetch the item,Di2015NewLine           // but only lock shortlyDi2015NewLine           lock (_lock)Di2015NewLine           {Di2015NewLine               if (_queue.Count > 0)Di2015NewLine                  item = _queue.Dequeue(item);Di2015NewLine           }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine           if (item != null)Di2015NewLine           {Di2015NewLine              // do stuffDi2015NewLine           }            Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        while (item != null); // loop until there are items to collectDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
8999698Di2015UniqueSeparatorConcurrentQueue<T>
8999698Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate readonly ConcurrentQueue<Item> _queue = new ConcurrentQueue<Item>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinevoid ProducerThread()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    while (ShouldRun) Di2015NewLine    { Di2015NewLine        Item item = GetNextItem();Di2015NewLine        _queue.Enqueue(item);Di2015NewLine        _signal.Set();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinevoid ConsumerThread()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    while (ShouldRun)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        _signal.Wait();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Item item = null;Di2015NewLine        while (_queue.TryDequeue(out item))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine           // do stuffDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
8999698Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate readonly ConcurrentQueue<Item> _queue = new ConcurrentQueue<Item>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinevoid ProducerThread()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    while (ShouldRun) Di2015NewLine    { Di2015NewLine        Item item = GetNextItem();Di2015NewLine        _queue.Enqueue(item);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // more than 10 items? panic!Di2015NewLine        // notify consumer immediatelyDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (_queue.Count >= 10)Di2015NewLine           _signal.Set();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinevoid ConsumerThread()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    while (ShouldRun)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // wait for a signal, OR untilDi2015NewLine        // 10 seconds elapsesDi2015NewLine        _signal.Wait(TimeSpan.FromSeconds(10));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Item item = null;Di2015NewLine        while (_queue.TryDequeue(out item))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine           // do stuffDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

9004001Di2015UniqueSeparatorinternal class StreamHelper {Di2015NewLine    private readonly NetworkStream stream;Di2015NewLine    private readonly byte[] buffer = new byte[1024];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public StreamHelper(Socket socket) {Di2015NewLine        stream = new NetworkStream(socket);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public NetworkStream Stream {Di2015NewLine        get {Di2015NewLine            return stream;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public byte[] Buffer {Di2015NewLine        get {Di2015NewLine            return buffer;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate static void Main(string[] args) {Di2015NewLine    IPEndPoint maxPort = new IPEndPoint(IPAddress.Parse("xxx.xxx.xxx.xxx"), 100);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Socket socket = new Socket(AddressFamily.InterNetwork, SocketType.Stream, ProtocolType.IP);Di2015NewLine    socket.Connect(maxPort);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    StreamHelper helper = new StreamHelper(socket);Di2015NewLine    helper.Stream.BeginRead(helper.Buffer, 0, helper.Buffer.Length, StreamReadCallback, helper);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    string Command = "LOGIN,,,xxxx\\n";Di2015NewLine    byte[] bytes = Encoding.ASCII.GetBytes(Command);Di2015NewLine    // note: the write isn't async, but should maybe be converted as wellDi2015NewLine    helper.Stream.Write(bytes, 0, bytes.Length);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Console.ReadLine(); // wait for a return key pressDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate static void StreamReadCallback(IAsyncResult ar) {Di2015NewLine    StreamHelper helper = (StreamHelper)ar.AsyncState;Di2015NewLine    // note: EndRead will throw an exception if something went wrong - you should deal with thatDi2015NewLine    int bytesRead = helper.Stream.EndRead(ar);Di2015NewLine    if (bytesRead > 0) {Di2015NewLine        string charsRead = Encoding.ASCII.GetString(helper.Buffer, 0, bytesRead);Di2015NewLine        Console.Write(charsRead);Di2015NewLine        helper.Stream.BeginRead(helper.Buffer, 0, helper.Buffer.Length, StreamReadCallback, helper);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

9006326Di2015UniqueSeparator      // Untested codeDi2015NewLinepublic class FactoryDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private static int _id = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Use Dictionary to store the mapping from int to TypeDi2015NewLine    // instead of ActionScript "classLib = new Array();"Di2015NewLine    private static readonly IDictionary<int, Type> _typeMappings = new Dictionary<int, Type>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public Factory()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static int AddClassLink(Type type)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // To insure uniqueness, increment a static local id and use thatDi2015NewLine        int localId = ++_id;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Store the Type of the class to instantiate against the integer IDDi2015NewLine        // Similar to ActionScript "classLib.push(logicClass); "Di2015NewLine        _typeMappings[localId] = type;          // Set in dictionaryDi2015NewLine        return localId;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    pubilc static FactoryObject CreateClassFromId(int id, DataObject constructorDataObject)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Get the class type by integer Id. Di2015NewLine        // You can also use _typeMappings.Contains and _typeMappings.TryGetValue() to Di2015NewLine        // add some checking firstDi2015NewLine        var type = _typeMappings[id];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // This is equivalent to new DerivedFactoryObject() where TypeDi2015NewLine        // is the runtime Type of the class registered in AddClassLinkDi2015NewLine        var obj = (FactoryObject)Activator.CreateInstance(type);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Initialise and return Di2015NewLine        obj.Init(constructorDataObject);Di2015NewLine        return obj;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

9008328Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static IObservable<TOut> ZipWithExpiry<TLeft, TRight, TOut>(Di2015NewLine                    IObservable<TLeft> left, Di2015NewLine                    IObservable<TRight> right, Di2015NewLine                    Func<TLeft, TRight, TOut> selector, Di2015NewLine                    TimeSpan validity)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return Observable.Zip(left.Timestamp(), right.Timestamp(), (l, r) => Tuple.Create(l, r))Di2015NewLine                             .Where(tuple => Math.Abs((tuple.Item1.Timestamp - tuple.Item2.Timestamp).TotalSeconds) < validity.TotalSeconds)Di2015NewLine                             .Select(tuple => selector(tuple.Item1.Value, tuple.Item2.Value));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine

9012339Di2015UniqueSeparator        void MinimalShell_Loaded(object sender, RoutedEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Open the Default ScreenDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // The navigation view model will only return those links that can be executed.  In orderDi2015NewLine        // to do that, it will call the CanExecute() method on the links - which is anDi2015NewLine        // asynchronous operation. Di2015NewLine        // "prime" the view model by asking for the links.  If we don't do this, the firstDi2015NewLine        // command entered in the shell will not work (all commands after that will work).Di2015NewLine        this.ServiceProxy.NavigationViewModel.NavigationItems.Count();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Getthe Tasks group as a INavigationItemDi2015NewLine        INavigationItem objINavigationItem = Di2015NewLine            (this.ServiceProxy.NavigationViewModel.DefaultItem as INavigationItem);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Cast the INavigationItem to a INavigationGroupDi2015NewLine        INavigationGroup objINavigationGroup = (INavigationGroup)objINavigationItem;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (objINavigationGroup.DefaultChild is INavigationScreen)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Get the Default ScreenDi2015NewLine            INavigationScreen objINavigationScreen = (INavigationScreen)objINavigationGroup.DefaultChild;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Set DefaultScreenNameDi2015NewLine            DefaultScreenName = objINavigationScreen.DisplayName;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // The screen may not be ready yetDi2015NewLine            // Wait until the screen can be openedDi2015NewLine            while (!objINavigationScreen.ExecutableObject.CanExecuteAsync)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // Do nothing until the screen can be openedDi2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Open the Default ScreenDi2015NewLine            objINavigationScreen.ExecutableObject.ExecuteAsync();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

9012662Di2015UniqueSeparatorfunction Encrypt($pass, $salt)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine     $derived = PBKDF1($pass, $salt, 100, 48);Di2015NewLine     $key = bin2hex(substr($derived, 0, 32));Di2015NewLine     $iv = bin2hex(substr($derived, 32, 16));Di2015NewLine     return mcrypt_encrypt(MCRYPT_RIJNDAEL_128, $key, $pass, MCRYPT_MODE_CBC, $iv);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

9013800Di2015UniqueSeparator// If Equals() returns true for a pair of objects Di2015NewLine// then GetHashCode() must return the same value for these objects.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic int GetHashCode(Product product)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    //Check whether the object is nullDi2015NewLine    if (Object.ReferenceEquals(product, null)) return 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //Get hash code for the Name field if it is not null.Di2015NewLine    int hashProductName = product.Name == null ? 0 : product.Name.GetHashCode();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //Get hash code for the Code field.Di2015NewLine    int hashProductCode = product.Code.GetHashCode();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //Calculate the hash code for the product.Di2015NewLine    return hashProductName ^ hashProductCode;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

9015353Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Collections.Generic;Di2015NewLineusing System.Linq;Di2015NewLineusing System.Reflection;Di2015NewLineusing MbUnit.Framework;Di2015NewLineusing Moq;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine[TestFixture]Di2015NewLinepublic class IDisposableTestsDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    [Test]Di2015NewLine    public void ThrowsObjectDisposedExceptions()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var assemblyToTest = Assembly.LoadWithPartialName("MyAssembly");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Get all types that implement IDisposableDi2015NewLine        var disposableTypes = Di2015NewLine            from type in assemblyToTest.GetTypes()Di2015NewLine            where type.GetInterface(typeof(IDisposable).FullName) != nullDi2015NewLine            select type;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        foreach (var type in disposableTypes)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Try to get default constructor first...Di2015NewLine            var constructor = type.GetConstructor(Type.EmptyTypes);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (constructor == null)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // Otherwise get first parameter based constructor...Di2015NewLine                var constructors = type.GetConstructors();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                if (constructors != null &&Di2015NewLine                    constructors.Length > 0)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    constructor = constructors[0];Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // If there is a public constructor...Di2015NewLine            if (constructor != null)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                object instance = Activator.CreateInstance(type, GetDefaultArguments(constructor));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                (instance as IDisposable).Dispose();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                foreach (var method in type.GetMethods())Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    if (!this.IsExcluded(method))Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        bool threwObjectDisposedException = false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                        tryDi2015NewLine                        {Di2015NewLine                            method.Invoke(instance,                   if (ex.InnerException.GetType() == typeof(ObjectDisposedException))Di2015NewLine                            {Di2015NewLine                                threwObjectDisposedException = true;Di2015NewLine                            }Di2015NewLine                        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                        Assert.IsTrue(threwObjectDisposedException);Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private bool IsExcluded(MethodInfo method)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // May want to include ToString, GetHashCode.Di2015NewLine        // Doesn't handle checking overloads which would take moreDi2015NewLine        // logic to compare parameters etc.Di2015NewLine        if (method.Name == "Dispose" ||Di2015NewLine            method.Name == "GetType")Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return true;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return false;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private object[] GetDefaultArguments(MethodBase method)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var arguments = new List<object>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        foreach (var parameter in method.GetParameters())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var type = parameter.ParameterType;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (type.IsValueType)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                arguments.Add(Activator.CreateInstance(type));Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            else if (!type.IsSealed)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                dynamic mock = Activator.CreateInstance(typeof(Mock<>).MakeGenericType(type));Di2015NewLine                arguments.Add(mock.Object);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

9015592Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class SomePropertyClassDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public string VarA { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    public string VarB { get; set; }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinestatic class ProgramDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        SomePropertyClass v1 = new SomePropertyClass() { VarA = "item 1" };Di2015NewLine        SomePropertyClass v2 = new SomePropertyClass() { VarB = "item 2" };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var yo = v1.Combine(v2);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    static public IEnumerable<object> Combine<T, U>(this T one, U two)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var properties1 = one.GetType().GetProperties().Where(p => p.CanRead && p.GetValue(one, null) != null).Select(p => p.GetValue(one, null));Di2015NewLine        var properties2 = two.GetType().GetProperties().Where(p => p.CanRead && p.GetValue(two, null) != null).Select(p => p.GetValue(two, null));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return new List<object>(properties1.Concat(properties2));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

9015598Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic MethodInfo GetMethod<TTarget, TEventArgs>(Expression<Func<EventHandler<TEventArgs>>> method) where TEventArgs:EventArgsDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var convert = method.Body as UnaryExpression;Di2015NewLine    var methodCall = (convert.Operand as MethodCallExpression);Di2015NewLine    if (methodCall != null && methodCall.Arguments.Count>2 && methodCall.Arguments[2] is ConstantExpression)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var methodInfo = (methodCall.Arguments[2]as ConstantExpression).Value as MethodInfo;Di2015NewLine        return methodInfo;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return null;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

9016654Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static void init() {Di2015NewLine    // define constantsDi2015NewLine    final int length = 3;Di2015NewLine    final char maxValue = '3';Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // define bufferDi2015NewLine    final char[] array = new char[length]; java.util.Arrays.fill(array, '0');Di2015NewLine    final boolean[] alreadySet = new boolean[length]; java.util.Arrays.fill(alreadySet, false);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // fill first digit, then let the recursion take placeDi2015NewLine    for(char c = '1'; c <= (char)(maxValue); c++) {Di2015NewLine        // iterate from lowest to highest digitDi2015NewLine        for(int i = array.length-1; i >= 0; i--) {Di2015NewLine            // set valueDi2015NewLine            array[i] = c;Di2015NewLine            alreadySet[i] = true;Di2015NewLine            // print valueDi2015NewLine            System.out.println(new String(array));Di2015NewLine            // call recursionDi2015NewLine            recursive(array, c, i, alreadySet, length);Di2015NewLine            // unset valueDi2015NewLine            alreadySet[i] = false;Di2015NewLine            array[i] = '0';Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic static void recursive(char[] array, char lastValue, int lastIndex, boolean[] alreadySet, int leftToSet) {Di2015NewLine    // if we didn't set all digitsDi2015NewLine    if(leftToSet > 0) {Di2015NewLine        // iterate from lowest to highest digitDi2015NewLine        for(int i = array.length-1; i >= 0; i--) {Di2015NewLine            // missing all digits already setDi2015NewLine            if(!alreadySet[i]) {Di2015NewLine                // count from 1 to lastValue-1Di2015NewLine                for(char c = '1'; c < lastValue; c++) {Di2015NewLine                    // set valueDi2015NewLine                    array[i] = c;Di2015NewLine                    alreadySet[i] = true;Di2015NewLine                    // print valueDi2015NewLine                    System.out.println(new String(array));Di2015NewLine                    // call recursionDi2015NewLine                    recursive(array, c, i, alreadySet, leftToSet-1);Di2015NewLine                    // unset valueDi2015NewLine                    alreadySet[i] = false;Di2015NewLine                    array[i] = '0';Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        char c = lastValue;Di2015NewLine        // iterate from lowest to highest digitDi2015NewLine        for(int i = array.length-1; i > lastIndex; i--) {Di2015NewLine            // missing all digits already setDi2015NewLine            if(!alreadySet[i]) {Di2015NewLine                // set valueDi2015NewLine                array[i] = c;Di2015NewLine                alreadySet[i] = true;Di2015NewLine                // print valueDi2015NewLine                System.out.println(new String(array));Di2015NewLine                // call recursionDi2015NewLine                recursive(array, c, i, alreadySet, leftToSet-1);Di2015NewLine                // unset valueDi2015NewLine                alreadySet[i] = false;Di2015NewLine                array[i] = '0';Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

9017228Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate static DateTime DoCalculation(DateTime startDate, int minutes)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (startDate.DayOfWeek == DayOfWeek.Sunday)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // if the input date is a sunday, set the actual SLA start date to the following monday morning 7:00AMDi2015NewLine        startDate = startDate.AddHours(24);Di2015NewLine        startDate = new DateTime(startDate.Year, startDate.Month, startDate.Day, 7, 0, 0);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    else if (startDate.DayOfWeek == DayOfWeek.Saturday)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // if the input date is a saturday, set the actual SLA start date to the following monday morning 7:00AMDi2015NewLine        startDate = startDate.AddHours(48);Di2015NewLine        startDate = new DateTime(startDate.Year, startDate.Month, startDate.Day, 7, 0, 0);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    DateTime resultDate = startDate;Di2015NewLine    for (int i = 0; i < minutes; i++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        resultDate = resultDate.AddMinutes(1);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // it is 5PM and time to go homeDi2015NewLine        if (resultDate.Hour >= 17)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // if tomorrow is saturdayDi2015NewLine            if (resultDate.AddDays(1).DayOfWeek == DayOfWeek.Saturday)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                //add 48 hours to get us through the whole weekendDi2015NewLine                resultDate = resultDate.AddHours(48);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // add 14 hours to get us to next morningDi2015NewLine            resultDate = resultDate.AddHours(14);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return resultDate;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

9017307Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic partial class Form1 : FormDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private Worker worker;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public Form1()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        InitializeComponent();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void button1_Click(object sender, EventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        worker = new Worker();Di2015NewLine        worker.ProgressUpdated += this.worker_ProgressUpdated;Di2015NewLine        worker.WorkDone += this.worker_WorkDone;Di2015NewLine        worker.Start();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void worker_WorkDone(object sender, EventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Detaches event handlersDi2015NewLine        // /!\\ Will be called from a thread different than the UI threadDi2015NewLine        worker.ProgressUpdated -= this.worker_ProgressUpdated;Di2015NewLine        worker.WorkDone -= this.worker_WorkDone;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void worker_ProgressUpdated(object sender, ProgressEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Updates the UIDi2015NewLine        // /!\\ Will be called from a thread different than the UI threadDi2015NewLine        this.SetLabelText(string.Format("Percentage: {0}", ((double)e.Value * 100 / (e.Max - e.Min))));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void SetLabelText(string text)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Following required if the method is called from a thread that is not the UI threadDi2015NewLine        if (this.label1.InvokeRequired)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            this.label1.Invoke(new MethodInvoker(() => this.SetLabelText(text)));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            this.label1.Text = text;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
9017307Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class ProgressEventArgs : EventArgsDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public int Value { get; set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public int Max { get; set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public int Min { get; set; }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class WorkerDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public delegate void ProgressUpdatedEventHandler(object sender, ProgressEventArgs e);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public event ProgressUpdatedEventHandler ProgressUpdated;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public event EventHandler WorkDone;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void Start()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Thread workerThread = new Thread(new ThreadStart(this.DoWork));Di2015NewLine        workerThread.Start();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void DoWork()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int min = 0;Di2015NewLine        int max = 1000000;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        for (int i = min; i < max; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Simulates workDi2015NewLine            ////System.Threading.Thread.Sleep(1);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Notify of progress updateDi2015NewLine            ////this.OnProgressUpdate(min, max, i);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Notify of progress update but not every time to save CPU timeDi2015NewLine            // Uses mod function to do the job 1 out of 100 timesDi2015NewLine            if (i % 100 == 0)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                this.OnProgressUpdate(min, max, i);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Notify the work is doneDi2015NewLine        if (this.WorkDone != null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            this.WorkDone(this, EventArgs.Empty);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void OnProgressUpdate(int min, int max, int value)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (this.ProgressUpdated != null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            this.ProgressUpdated(this, new ProgressEventArgs { Max = max, Min = min, Value = value });Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

9019432Di2015UniqueSeparator    internal static void DrawPhrase(Di2015NewLine        this Graphics graphics, Di2015NewLine        int width, Di2015NewLine        int height, Di2015NewLine        string phrase)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        graphics.FillRectangle(Di2015NewLine            Brushes.White,Di2015NewLine            0,Di2015NewLine            0,Di2015NewLine            width,Di2015NewLine            height);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        using (var gp = new GraphicsPath())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            gp.AddString(phrase,Di2015NewLine                         FontFamily.GenericMonospace,Di2015NewLine                         (int)FontStyle.Bold,Di2015NewLine                         33f,Di2015NewLine                         new Point(0,Di2015NewLine                                   0),Di2015NewLine                         StringFormat.GenericTypographic);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            using (var gpp = gp.Deform(width, height))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                var bounds = gpp.GetBounds();Di2015NewLine                var matrix = new Matrix();Di2015NewLine                var x = (width - bounds.Width) / 2 - bounds.Left;Di2015NewLine                var y = (height - bounds.Height) / 2 - bounds.Top;Di2015NewLine                matrix.Translate(x,Di2015NewLine                                 y);Di2015NewLine                gpp.Transform(matrix);Di2015NewLine                graphics.FillPath(Brushes.Black,Di2015NewLine                                  gpp);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        graphics.Flush();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    internal static GraphicsPath Deform(Di2015NewLine        this GraphicsPath path, Di2015NewLine        int width, Di2015NewLine        int height)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var WarpFactor = 4;Di2015NewLine        var xAmp = WarpFactor * width / 300d;Di2015NewLine        var yAmp = WarpFactor * height / 50d;Di2015NewLine        var xFreq = 2d * Math.PI / width;Di2015NewLine        var yFreq = 2d * Math.PI / height;Di2015NewLine        var deformed = new PointF[path.PathPoints.Length];Di2015NewLine        var xSeed = rng.NextDouble() * 2 * Math.PI;Di2015NewLine        var ySeed = rng.NextDouble() * 2 * Math.PI;Di2015NewLine        var i = 0;Di2015NewLine        foreach (var original in path.PathPoints)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var val = xFreq * original.X + yFreq * original.Y;Di2015NewLine            var xOffset = (int)(xAmp * Math.Sin(val + xSeed));Di2015NewLine            var yOffset = (int)(yAmp * Math.Sin(val + ySeed));Di2015NewLine            deformed[i++] = new PointF(original.X + xOffset,Di2015NewLine                                     original.Y + yOffset);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return new GraphicsPath(deformed,Di2015NewLine                                path.PathTypes);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

9024092Di2015UniqueSeparatorFor i = 0 to NumberOfDivisionsDi2015NewLine  HorizontalPosition = CircleRadius - (cos(pi/NumberOfDivisions * i) * CircleRadius)Di2015NewLine  TopOfLine = sin(pi/NumberOfDivisions * i) * CircleRadius * 0.5 //The 0.5 assumes that the ellipse will only be half as tall as it is wide.Di2015NewLine  BottomOfLine = TopOfLine + HeightOfCylinderDi2015NewLine  //draw vertical line where:Di2015NewLine  //X1=HorizontalPosition, Y1=TopOfLineDi2015NewLine  //X2=HorizontalPosition, Y2=BottomOfLineDi2015NewLineNextDi2015NewLine

9024330Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static string[] GetStringInBetween(string strBegin, string strEnd, string strSource, bool includeBegin, bool includeEnd)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    string[] result = { "", "" };Di2015NewLine    int iIndexOfBegin = strSource.IndexOf(strBegin, StringComparison.Ordinal);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (iIndexOfBegin != -1)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int iEnd = strSource.IndexOf(strEnd, iIndexOfBegin, StringComparison.Ordinal);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (iEnd != -1)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            result[0] = strSource.Substring(Di2015NewLine                iIndexOfBegin + (includeBegin ? 0 : strBegin.Length), Di2015NewLine                iEnd + (includeEnd ? strEnd.Length : 0) - iIndexOfBegin);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // advance beyond this segmentDi2015NewLine            if (iEnd + strEnd.Length < strSource.Length)Di2015NewLine                result[1] = strSource.Substring(iEnd + strEnd.Length);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return result;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

9027666Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static bool All<TSource>(this IEnumerable<TSource> source, Func<TSource, bool> predicate)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (source == null)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        throw Error.ArgumentNull("source");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    if (predicate == null)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        throw Error.ArgumentNull("predicate");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    foreach (TSource current in source)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (!predicate(current))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return false;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return true;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

9029450Di2015UniqueSeparator        public static IEnumerable<char> SplitItOut(IEnumerable<string> words)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var source = new ConcurrentBag<string>(words);Di2015NewLine            var chars = new BlockingCollection<char>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            var tasks = new[]Di2015NewLine                   {Di2015NewLine                       Task.Factory.StartNew(() => CharProducer(source, chars)),Di2015NewLine                       Task.Factory.StartNew(() => CharProducer(source, chars)),Di2015NewLine                       //add more, tweak away, or use a factory to create tasks.Di2015NewLine                       //measure before you simply add more!Di2015NewLine                   };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            Task.Factory.ContinueWhenAll(tasks, t => chars.CompleteAdding());Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return chars.GetConsumingEnumerable();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine

DefaultValueGetters.SingleOrDefault(getter => getter.PropertyName == propertyName);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public ISetter GetSetter(Type theClass, string propertyName)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return new NoopSetter();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// taken from the linkDi2015NewLine[Serializable]Di2015NewLinepublic class DefaultValueGetter<T> : IGetter {...}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// ---- and the most tricky part ----Di2015NewLinepublic static void defaults);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate static void DefaultValuesInternal<T>(Di2015NewLine    Func<Expression<Func<T, object>>, PropertyPart> mapFunction, DefaultValuesBase defaults)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var noopSetter = new NoopSetter();Di2015NewLine    var defaultsType = defaults.GetType();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    foreach (var defaultgetter in defaults.DefaultValueGetters)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var parameter = Expression.Parameter(typeof(T), "x");Di2015NewLine        Expression body = Expression.Property(parameter,Di2015NewLine            new GetterSetterPropertyInfo(typeof(T), defaultgetter, noopSetter));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        body = Expression.Convert(body, typeof(object));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var lambda = Expression.Lambda<Func<T, object>>(body, parameter);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        mapFunction(lambda).Column(defaultgetter.PropertyName).Access.Using(defaultsType);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// GetterSetterPropertyInfo inherits PropertyInfo with important partDi2015NewLinepublic override string NameDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    get { return m_getter.PropertyName; } // propertyName is the column in dbDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// 9037167Di2015UniqueSeparator                // Start with all public instance properties of typeDi2015NewLinevar accessors = from property in type.GetPropertiesDi2015NewLine                         (BindingFlags.Instance | BindingFlags.Public)Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // Property must be readableDi2015NewLine                where property.CanReadDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                //Assemble expression tree of the form:Di2015NewLine                // foo => (object) foo.PropertyDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // fooDi2015NewLine                let parameter = Expression.Parameter(type, "foo")Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // foo.Property Di2015NewLine                let propertyEx = Expression.Property(parameter, property)Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // (object)foo.Property - We need this conversionDi2015NewLine                // because the property may be a value-type.Di2015NewLine                let body = Expression.Convert(propertyEx, typeof(object))Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // foo => (object) foo.PropertyDi2015NewLine                let expr = Expression.Lambda<Func<T,object>>(body, parameter)Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // Compile tree to Func<T,object> delegateDi2015NewLine                select expr.Compile();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinereturn accessors.ToList();Di2015NewLine

9040124Di2015UniqueSeparatorfloat roundAngle = 15 * Deg2Rad;Di2015NewLinefloat angle = (float)Math.Atan2(normal.Y, normal.X);Di2015NewLineVector2 newNormal;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineif (angle % roundAngle != 0)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    float newAngle = (float)Math.Round(angle / roundAngle) * roundAngle;Di2015NewLine    newNormal = new Vector2((float)Math.Cos(newAngle), (float)Math.Sin(newAngle));Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineelseDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    newNormal = Vector2.Normalize(normal);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
9040124Di2015UniqueSeparator// 4 degrees should round to 0Di2015NewLine    (4 + 7.5) / 15 == 11.5 / 15 == 0.77Di2015NewLine// When this gets rounded up to 1 and multiplied by 15 again, it becomes 15 degrees.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Don't add 7.5, and you get this:Di2015NewLine    4 / 15 == 0.27Di2015NewLine// When rounded, it becomes 0 and, as such the correct answerDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Now how about a negative number; -12Di2015NewLine    -12 / 15 == -0.8Di2015NewLine// Again, when rounded we get the correct numberDi2015NewLine

9040526Di2015UniqueSeparator| 0   1   2   3   4 |Di2015NewLine|                   |Di2015NewLine| 1   5   6   7   8 |Di2015NewLine|                   |Di2015NewLine| 2   6   9  10  11 |Di2015NewLine|                   |Di2015NewLine| 3   7  10  12  13 |Di2015NewLine|                   |Di2015NewLine| 4   8  11  13  14 |Di2015NewLine
9040526Di2015UniqueSeparator5*(5+1)/2 = 15
9040526Di2015UniqueSeparator0..14
9040526Di2015UniqueSeparatori
9040526Di2015UniqueSeparatork(i,i) = i*(N+1)-i*(i+1)/2
9040526Di2015UniqueSeparatori=2
9040526Di2015UniqueSeparatork(2,2) = 2*(5+1)-2*(2+1)/2 = 9
9040526Di2015UniqueSeparatori
9040526Di2015UniqueSeparatork(i,N) = N*(i+1)-i*(i+1)/2-1
9040526Di2015UniqueSeparatork(2,4) = 5*(2+1)-2*(2+1)/2-1 = 11
9040526Di2015UniqueSeparatork
9040526Di2015UniqueSeparatori
9040526Di2015UniqueSeparatorj
9040526Di2015UniqueSeparatori<=j

9043614Di2015UniqueSeparatorenum ReadState { Waiting, Reading, Finished }Di2015NewLinestatic string ReadMessage(SerialPort port)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var messageBuffer = new StringBuilder("S");Di2015NewLine    var state = ReadState.Waiting;Di2015NewLine    while (state != ReadState.Finished)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        switch (state)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine        case ReadState.Waiting:Di2015NewLine            if (port.ReadChar() == 'S')Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                state = ReadState.Reading;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            break;Di2015NewLine        case ReadState.Reading:Di2015NewLine            messageBuffer.Append(port.ReadTo("E"));Di2015NewLine            state = ReadState.Finished;Di2015NewLine            break;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return messageBuffer.ToString();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

9044683Di2015UniqueSeparator    [TestMethod]Di2015NewLine    public void DynamicTest()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        List<DataObject> dataObjects = new List<DataObject>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        dynamic firstObject = new DataObject();Di2015NewLine        dynamic secondObject = new DataObject();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        firstObject.dblProp = 10.0;Di2015NewLine        firstObject.intProp = 8;Di2015NewLine        firstObject.strProp = "Hello";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        secondObject.dblProp = 8.0;Di2015NewLine        secondObject.intProp = 8;Di2015NewLine        secondObject.strProp = "World";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        dataObjects.Add(firstObject);Di2015NewLine        dataObjects.Add(secondObject);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /* Notice the different types */Di2015NewLine        string newQuery = FormatQuery("dblProp > 9.0 AND intProp = 8 AND strProp = 'Hello'");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var result = dataObjects.Where(newQuery);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Assert.AreEqual(result.Count(), 1);Di2015NewLine        Assert.AreEqual(result.First(), firstObject);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine
9044683Di2015UniqueSeparator    public string FormatQuery(string query)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        query = query.Replace('\\'', '\\"');Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        string[] operators = new string[] { "<", ">", "!=", "<=", ">=", "<>", "=" };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        string[] parts = query.Split();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < parts.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (operators.Contains(parts[i]))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                parts[i - 1] = "it[\\"" + parts[i - 1] + "\\"]";Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return String.Join(" ", parts);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

9046640Di2015UniqueSeparatorExpression
9046640Di2015UniqueSeparatorXName xBinary = "binary";Di2015NewLineXName xLiteral = "literal";Di2015NewLineExpression Visit(XElement elt)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (elt.Name == xBinary)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return VisitBinary(elt);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    else if (elt.Name == xLiteral)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return VisitLiteral(elt);Di2015NewLine    } // ...Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    throw new NotSupportedException();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
9046640Di2015UniqueSeparatorVisit
9046640Di2015UniqueSeparatorVisit
9046640Di2015UniqueSeparatorExpression VisitLiteral(XElement elt)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    Debug.Assert(elt.Name == xLiteral);Di2015NewLine    return Expression.Constant((int)elt);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineExpression VisitBinary(XElement elt)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    Debug.Assert(elt.Name == xBinary);Di2015NewLine    Debug.Assert(elt.Elements().Count() >= 3);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var lhs = elt.Elements().ElementAt(0);Di2015NewLine    var op = elt.Elements().ElementAt(1);Di2015NewLine    var rhs = elt.Elements().ElementAt(2);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    switch((string)op)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine    case "+":Di2015NewLine        // by chaining LHS and RHS to Visit we allow the tree to be constructedDi2015NewLine        // properly as Visit performs the per-element dispatchDi2015NewLine        return Expression.Add(Visit(lhs), Visit(rhs));Di2015NewLine    case "&&":Di2015NewLine        return Expression.AndAlso(Visit(lhs), Visit(rhs));Di2015NewLine    default:Di2015NewLine        throw new NotSupportedException();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

9053614Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static void CopyAll(DirectoryInfo source, DirectoryInfo target)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (source.FullName.ToLower() == target.FullName.ToLower())Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Check if the target directory exists, if not, create it.Di2015NewLine    if (Directory.Exists(target.FullName) == false)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Directory.CreateDirectory(target.FullName);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Copy each file into it's new directory.Di2015NewLine    foreach (FileInfo fi in source.GetFiles())Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine(@"Copying {0}\\{1}", target.FullName, fi.Name);Di2015NewLine        fi.CopyTo(Path.Combine(target.ToString(), fi.Name), true);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Copy each subdirectory using recursion.Di2015NewLine    foreach (DirectoryInfo diSourceSubDir in source.GetDirectories())Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        DirectoryInfo nextTargetSubDir =Di2015NewLine            target.CreateSubdirectory(diSourceSubDir.Name);Di2015NewLine        CopyAll(diSourceSubDir, nextTargetSubDir);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

9054184Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.IO.Ports;Di2015NewLineusing System.Threading;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class PortChatDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    static message;Di2015NewLine        StringComparer stringComparer = StringComparer.OrdinalIgnoreCase;Di2015NewLine        Thread readThread = new Thread(Read);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Create a new SerialPort object with default settings.Di2015NewLine        _serialPort = new SerialPort();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Allow the user to set the appropriate properties.Di2015NewLine        _serialPort.PortName = SetPortName(_serialPort.PortName);Di2015NewLine        _serialPort.BaudRate = SetPortBaudRate(_serialPort.BaudRate);Di2015NewLine        _serialPort.Parity = SetPortParity(_serialPort.Parity);Di2015NewLine        _serialPort.DataBits = SetPortDataBits(_serialPort.DataBits);Di2015NewLine        _serialPort.StopBits = SetPortStopBits(_serialPort.StopBits);Di2015NewLine        _serialPort.Handshake = SetPortHandshake(_serialPort.Handshake);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Set the read/write timeoutsDi2015NewLine        _serialPort.ReadTimeout = 500;Di2015NewLine        _serialPort.WriteTimeout = 500;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        _serialPort.Open();Di2015NewLine        _continue = true;Di2015NewLine        readThread.Start();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Console.Write("Name: ");Di2015NewLine        name = Console.ReadLine();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("Type QUIT to exit");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        while (_continue)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            message = Console.ReadLine();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (stringComparer.Equals("quit", message))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                _continue = false;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                _serialPort.WriteLine(Di2015NewLine                    String.Format("<{0}>: {1}", name, message) );Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        readThread.Join();Di2015NewLine        _serialPort.Close();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static void Read()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine 9056757Di2015UniqueSeparatorIsLargeAware("some.exe");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinestatic bool IsLargeAware(string file)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    using (var fs = File.OpenRead(file))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return IsLargeAware(fs);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine/// <summary>Di2015NewLine/// Checks if the stream is a MZ header and if it is large address awareDi2015NewLine/// </summary>Di2015NewLine/// <param name="stream">Stream to check, make sure its at the start of the MZ header</param>Di2015NewLine/// <exception cref=""></exception>Di2015NewLine/// <returns></returns>Di2015NewLinestatic bool IsLargeAware(Stream stream)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    const int IMAGE_FILE_LARGE_ADDRESS_AWARE = 0x20;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var br = new BinaryReader(stream);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (br.ReadInt16() != 0x5A4D)       //No MZ HeaderDi2015NewLine        return false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    br.BaseStream.Position = 0x3C;Di2015NewLine    var peloc = br.ReadInt32();         //Get the PE header location.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    br.BaseStream.Position = peloc;Di2015NewLine    if (br.ReadInt32() != 0x4550)       //No PE headerDi2015NewLine        return false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    br.BaseStream.Position += 0x12;Di2015NewLine    return (br.ReadInt16() & IMAGE_FILE_LARGE_ADDRESS_AWARE) == IMAGE_FILE_LARGE_ADDRESS_AWARE;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

9057158Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic readonly ILog s_Log = LogManager.GetType("SerialWorkaroundLogger");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinestatic void SafeDisconnect(SerialPort port, Stream internalSerialStream)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    GC.SuppressFinalize(port);Di2015NewLine    GC.SuppressFinalize(internalSerialStream);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    ShutdownEventLoopHandler(internalSerialStream);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    tryDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        s_Log.DebugFormat("Disposing internal serial stream");Di2015NewLine        internalSerialStream.Close();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    catch (Exception ex)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        s_Log.DebugFormat(Di2015NewLine            "Exception in serial stream shutdown of port {0}: {1}", port.PortName, ex);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    tryDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        s_Log.DebugFormat("Disposing serial port");Di2015NewLine        port.Close();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    catch (Exception ex)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        s_Log.DebugFormat("Exception in port {0} shutdown: {1}", port.PortName, ex);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinestatic void ShutdownEventLoopHandler(Stream internalSerialStream)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    tryDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        s_Log.DebugFormat("Working around .NET SerialPort class Dispose bug");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        FieldInfo eventRunnerField = internalSerialStream.GetType()Di2015NewLine            .GetField("eventRunner", BindingFlags.NonPublic | BindingFlags.Instance);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (eventRunnerField == null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            s_Log.WarnFormat(Di2015NewLine                "Unable to find EventLoopRunner field. "Di2015NewLine                + "SerialPort workaround failure. Application may crash after "Di2015NewLine                + "disposing SerialPort unless .NET 1.1 unhandled exception "Di2015NewLine                + "policy is enabled from the application's config file.");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            object eventRunner = eventRunnerField.GetValue(internalSerialStream);Di2015NewLine            Type eventRunnerType = eventRunner.GetType();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            FieldInfo endEventLoopFieldInfo = eventRunnerType.GetField(Di2015NewLine                "endEventLoop", BindingFlags.Instance | BindingFlags.NonPublic);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            FieldInfo eventLoopEndedSignalFieldInfo = eventRunnerType.GetField(Di2015NewLine                "eventLoopEndedSignal", BindingFlags.Instance | BindingFlags.NonPublic);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            FieldInfo waitCommEventWaitHandleFieldInfo = eventRunnerType.GetField(Di2015NewLine                "waitCommEventWaitHandle", BindingFlags.Instance | BindingFlags.NonPublic);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (endEventLoopFieldInfo == nullDi2015NewLine                || eventLoopEndedSignalFieldInfo == nullDi2015NewLine                || waitCommEventWaitHandleFieldInfo == null)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                s_Log.WarnFormat(Di2015NewLine                    "Unable to find the EventLoopRunner internal wait handle or loop signal fields. "Di2015NewLine                    + "SerialPort workaround failure. Application may crash after "Di2015NewLine                    + "disposing SerialPort unless .NET 1.1 unhandled exception "Di2015NewLine                    + "policy is enabled from the application's config file.");Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                s_Log.DebugFormat(Di2015NewLine                    "Waiting for the SerialPort internal EventLoopRunner thread to finish...");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                var eventLoopEndedWaitHandle =Di2015NewLine                    (WaitHandle)eventLoopEndedSignalFieldInfo.GetValue(eventRunner);Di2015NewLine                var waitCommEventWaitHandle =Di2015NewLine                    (ManualResetEvent)waitCommEventWaitHandleFieldInfo.GetValue(eventRunner);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                endEventLoopFieldInfo.SetValue(eventRunner, true);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // Sometimes the event loop handler resets the wait handleDi2015NewLine                // before exiting the loop and hangs (in case of USB disconnect)Di2015NewLine                // In case it takes too long, brute-force it out of its wait byDi2015NewLine                // setting the handle again.Di2015NewLine                doDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    waitCommEventWaitHandle.Set();Di2015NewLine                } while (!eventLoopEndedWaitHandle.WaitOne(2000));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                s_Log.DebugFormat("Wait completed. Now it is safe to continue disposal.");Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    catch (Exception ex)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        s_Log.ErrorFormat(Di2015NewLine            "SerialPort workaround failure. Application may crash after "Di2015NewLine            + "disposing SerialPort unless .NET 1.1 unhandled exception "Di2015NewLine            + "policy is enabled from the application's config file: {0}",Di2015NewLine            ex);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
9057174Di2015UniqueSeparatori++
9057174Di2015UniqueSeparatorint _lives;Di2015NewLineint _ammo;Di2015NewLineList<Vector2> _positions;Di2015NewLineVector2 _playerPosition;Di2015NewLineint _currentLevel;    Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinevoid LoadLevel(int level)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    _currentLevel = level;Di2015NewLine    _playerPosition = Vector2.Zero;Di2015NewLine    _lives = 3;Di2015NewLine    _ammo = 100;Di2015NewLine    List<Vector2> list = new List<Vector2>();Di2015NewLine    Random rnd = new Random();Di2015NewLine    int i = 0;Di2015NewLine    while(i < level)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      list.Add(_positions[rnd.Next(0,10)]);Di2015NewLine      i++;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    ...Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
9057174Di2015UniqueSeparatorprotected void Update(GameTime gameTime)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if(goToNextLevel) //here you put your condition that advances to next level;Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        LoadLevel(_currentLevel+1);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
9057174Di2015UniqueSeparator    List<Vector2> list = new List<Vector2>();Di2015NewLine    List<Vector2> tempList = new List<Vector2>(_positions);Di2015NewLine    Random rnd = new Random();Di2015NewLine    int i = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    while(i < level)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      int index = rnd.Next(tempList.Count); //random goes up to number of itemsDi2015NewLine      list.Add(tempList[index]); //add the randomed itemDi2015NewLine      tempList.RemoveAt(index); //remove the randomed item from the temporary list.Di2015NewLine      i++;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    ...Di2015NewLine

button As ToolStripDropDownButton = DirectCast(sender, ToolStripDropDownButton)Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                For Each item As ToolStripItem In button.DropDownItemsDi2015NewLine                    Dim extension As RenderingExtension = DirectCast(item.Tag, RenderingExtension)Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    If extension IsNot Nothing ThenDi2015NewLine              item.Image = My.Resources.page_white_word_16x16Di2015NewLine                                item.Text = "Word"Di2015NewLine                        End SelectDi2015NewLine                    End IfDi2015NewLine                NextDi2015NewLine            End IfDi2015NewLine        End SubDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Private Function FindToolStrip(Of T As     End IfDi2015NewLine                NextDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                Return resultDi2015NewLine            End IfDi2015NewLine        End FunctionDi2015NewLine

9072424Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static IObservable<TSource> Start<TSource>(Func<TSource> function)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (function == null)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        throw new ArgumentNullException("function");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return function.ToAsync<TSource>()();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic static Func<IObservable<TResult>> ToAsync<TResult>(Di2015NewLine    this Func<TResult> function)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (function == null)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        throw new ArgumentNullException("function");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return function.ToAsync<TResult>(Scheduler.ThreadPool);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

9072428Di2015UniqueSeparator    //Add Watermark to photo.Di2015NewLine    private System.Drawing.Image CreateWatermark(System.Drawing.Image imgPhoto, string Copyright)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Graphics g = Graphics.FromImage(imgPhoto);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        g.SmoothingMode = SmoothingMode.HighQuality;Di2015NewLine        g.InterpolationMode = InterpolationMode.HighQualityBicubic;Di2015NewLine        g.PixelOffsetMode = PixelOffsetMode.HighQuality;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        foreach (PropertyItem pItem in imgPhoto.PropertyItems)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            imgPhoto.SetPropertyItem(pItem);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        int phWidth = imgPhoto.Width;Di2015NewLine        int phHeight = imgPhoto.Height;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //create a Bitmap the Size of the original photographDi2015NewLine        Bitmap bmPhoto = new Bitmap(phWidth, phHeight, PixelFormat.Format24bppRgb);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        bmPhoto.SetResolution(imgPhoto.HorizontalResolution, imgPhoto.VerticalResolution);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //load the Bitmap into a Graphics object Di2015NewLine        Graphics grPhoto = Graphics.FromImage(bmPhoto);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //------------------------------------------------------------Di2015NewLine        //Step #1 - Insert Copyright messageDi2015NewLine        //------------------------------------------------------------Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //Set the rendering quality for this Graphics objectDi2015NewLine        grPhoto.SmoothingMode = SmoothingMode.AntiAlias;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //Draws the photo Image object at original size to the graphics object.Di2015NewLine        grPhoto.DrawImage(Di2015NewLine            imgPhoto,                               // Photo Image objectDi2015NewLine            new Rectangle(0, 0, phWidth, phHeight), // Rectangle structureDi2015NewLine            0,                                      // x-coordinate of the portion of the source image to draw. Di2015NewLine            0,                                      // y-coordinate of the portion of the source image to draw. Di2015NewLine            phWidth,                                // Width of the portion of the source image to draw. Di2015NewLine            phHeight,                               // Height of the portion of the source image to draw. Di2015NewLine            GraphicsUnit.Pixel);                    // Units of measure Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //-------------------------------------------------------Di2015NewLine        //to maximize the size of the Copyright message we will Di2015NewLine        //test multiple Font sizes to determine the largest posible Di2015NewLine        //font we can use for the width of the PhotographDi2015NewLine        //define an array of point sizes you would like to consider as possiblitiesDi2015NewLine        //-------------------------------------------------------Di2015NewLine        int[] sizes = new int[] { 16, 14, 12, 10, 8, 6, 4 };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Font crFont = null;Di2015NewLine        SizeF crSize = new SizeF();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //Loop through the defined sizes checking the length of the Copyright stringDi2015NewLine        //If its length in pixles is less then the image width choose this Font size.Di2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < 7; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            //set a Font object to Arial (i)pt, BoldDi2015NewLine            crFont = new Font("arial", sizes[i], FontStyle.Bold);Di2015NewLine            //Measure the Copyright string in this FontDi2015NewLine            crSize = grPhoto.MeasureString(Copyright, crFont);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if ((ushort)crSize.Width < (ushort)phWidth)Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //Since all photographs will have varying heights, determine a Di2015NewLine        //position 5% from the bottom of the imageDi2015NewLine        int yPixlesFromBottom = (int)(phHeight * .05);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //Now that we have a point size use the Copyrights string height Di2015NewLine        //to determine a y-coordinate to draw the string of the photographDi2015NewLine        float yPosFromBottom = ((phHeight - yPixlesFromBottom) - (crSize.Height / 2));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //Determine its x-coordinate by calculating the center of the width of the imageDi2015NewLine        float xCenterOfImg = (phWidth / 2);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //Define the text layout by setting the text alignment to centeredDi2015NewLine        StringFormat StrFormat = new StringFormat();Di2015NewLine        StrFormat.Alignment = StringAlignment.Near;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //define a Brush which is semi trasparent black (Alpha set to 153)Di2015NewLine        SolidBrush semiTransBrush2 = new SolidBrush(System.Drawing.Color.FromArgb(153, 0, 0, 0));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //Draw the Copyright stringDi2015NewLine        grPhoto.DrawString(Copyright,                 //string of textDi2015NewLine            crFont,                                   //fontDi2015NewLine            semiTransBrush2,                           //BrushDi2015NewLine            new PointF(xCenterOfImg + 1, yPosFromBottom + 1),  //PositionDi2015NewLine            StrFormat);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //define a Brush which is semi trasparent white (Alpha set to 153)Di2015NewLine        SolidBrush semiTransBrush = new SolidBrush(System.Drawing.Color.FromArgb(153, 255, 255, 255));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //Draw the Copyright string a second time to create a shadow effectDi2015NewLine        //Make sure to move this text 1 pixel to the right and down 1 pixelDi2015NewLine        grPhoto.DrawString(Copyright,                 //string of textDi2015NewLine            crFont,                                   //fontDi2015NewLine            semiTransBrush,                           //BrushDi2015NewLine            new PointF(xCenterOfImg, yPosFromBottom),  //PositionDi2015NewLine            StrFormat);                               //Text alignmentDi2015NewLine        imgPhoto = bmPhoto;Di2015NewLine        return imgPhoto;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

9072809Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class ConsoleRedirector : IDisposableDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private static ConsoleRedirector _instance;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static void attach(ProgressChangedEventHandler handler, bool forceConsoleRedirection)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Debug.Assert(null == _instance);Di2015NewLine        _instance = new ConsoleRedirector(handler, forceConsoleRedirection);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static void detatch()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        _instance.Dispose();Di2015NewLine        _instance = null;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static bool isAttachedDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        getDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return null != _instance;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static void ResetConsoleOutStream()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        //Force console to recreate its output stream the next time Write/WriteLine is calledDi2015NewLine        typeof(Console).GetField("_out", System.Reflection.BindingFlags.Static | System.Reflection.BindingFlags.NonPublic).SetValue(null, null);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private const int PERIOD = 500;Di2015NewLine    private const int BUFFER_SIZE = 4096;Di2015NewLine    private volatile bool _isDisposed;Di2015NewLine    private BackgroundWorker _worker;Di2015NewLine    private readonly IntPtr _stdout;Di2015NewLine    private readonly Mutex _sync;Di2015NewLine    private readonly System.Threading.Timer _timer;Di2015NewLine    private readonly char[] _buffer;Di2015NewLine    private readonly AnonymousPipeServerStream _outServer;Di2015NewLine    private readonly TextReader _outClient;Di2015NewLine    private readonly bool _forceConsoleRedirection;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private StreamWriter _consoleStandardOut;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private ConsoleRedirector(ProgressChangedEventHandler handler, bool forceConsoleRedirection)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        bool ret;Di2015NewLine        _forceConsoleRedirection = forceConsoleRedirection;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (!_forceConsoleRedirection)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            //Make sure Console._out is initialized before we redirect stdout, so the redirection won't affect itDi2015NewLine            TextWriter temp = Console.Out;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        AnonymousPipeClientStream client;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        _worker = new BackgroundWorker();Di2015NewLine        _worker.ProgressChanged += handler;Di2015NewLine        _worker.DoWork += _worker_DoWork;Di2015NewLine        _worker.WorkerReportsProgress = true;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        _stdout = GetStdHandle(STD_OUTPUT_HANDLE);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        _sync = new Mutex();Di2015NewLine        _buffer = new char[BUFFER_SIZE];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        _outServer = new AnonymousPipeServerStream(PipeDirection.Out);Di2015NewLine        client = new AnonymousPipeClientStream(PipeDirection.In, _outServer.ClientSafePipeHandle);Di2015NewLine        Debug.Assert(_outServer.IsConnected);Di2015NewLine        _outClient = new StreamReader(client, Encoding.Default);Di2015NewLine        ret = SetStdHandle(STD_OUTPUT_HANDLE, _outServer.SafePipeHandle.DangerousGetHandle());Di2015NewLine        Debug.Assert(ret);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (_forceConsoleRedirection)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            ResetConsoleOutStream(); //calls to Console.Write/WriteLine will now get made against the redirected streamDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        _worker.RunWorkerAsync(_outClient);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        _timer = new System.Threading.Timer(flush, null, PERIOD, PERIOD);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    void _worker_DoWork(object sender, DoWorkEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        BackgroundWorker worker = (BackgroundWorker)sender;Di2015NewLine        TextReader client = (TextReader)e.Argument;Di2015NewLine        tryDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            while (true)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                int read = client.Read(_buffer, 0, BUFFER_SIZE);Di2015NewLine                if (read > 0)Di2015NewLine                    worker.ReportProgress(0, new string(_buffer, 0, read));Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        catch (ObjectDisposedException)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Pipe was closed... terminateDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        catch (Exception ex)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void flush(object state)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        _outServer.Flush();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void Dispose()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Dispose(true);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    ~ConsoleRedirector()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Dispose(false);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void Dispose(bool disposing)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (!_isDisposed)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            lock (_sync)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (!_isDisposed)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    _isDisposed = true;Di2015NewLine                    _timer.Change(Timeout.Infinite, Timeout.Infinite);Di2015NewLine                    _timer.Dispose();Di2015NewLine                    flush(null);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    try { SetStdHandle(STD_OUTPUT_HANDLE, _stdout);}Di2015NewLine                    catch (Exception) { }Di2015NewLine                    _outClient.Dispose();Di2015NewLine                    _outServer.Dispose();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    if (_forceConsoleRedirection)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        ResetConsoleOutStream(); //Calls to Console.Write/WriteLine will now get redirected to the original stdout streamDi2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private const int STD_OUTPUT_HANDLE = -11;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    [DllImport("kernel32.dll")]Di2015NewLine    [return: MarshalAs(UnmanagedType.Bool)]Di2015NewLine    private static extern bool SetStdHandle(int nStdHandle, IntPtr hHandle);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    [DllImport("kernel32.dll")]Di2015NewLine    private static extern IntPtr GetStdHandle(int nStdHandle);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

9073200Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinenamespace TestDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    abstract class  BaseDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        public string Data;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    class Derived : BaseDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // this is a separate field, has nothing in common with the base class field but nameDi2015NewLine        new public string Data;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    class ProgramDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Derived test = new Derived();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //Let's set the Data field in the derived classDi2015NewLine            test.Data = "Derived";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //Now let's set this field in the base classDi2015NewLine            Base cast = test;Di2015NewLine            cast.Data = "Base";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //We can see that the feild in the derived class has not changedDi2015NewLine            //This will print 'Derived'Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine(test.Data);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Just to make sure that a new object has not been constructed by a miracaleDi2015NewLine            // let's pass our object to a function that will display the Data field fromDi2015NewLine            // the base classDi2015NewLine            Test(test);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        static void Test(Derived test)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // When called from the Main above this will print 'Base'Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine(((Base)test).Data);            Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

i < maxGarbage; i++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine       // Create objects and release them to fill up memoryDi2015NewLine       // with unused objects.Di2015NewLine       vt = new Version();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
