9078154Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class ContextDisposer : IHttpModuleDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private readonly DatabaseContext _context = new DatabaseContext();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void Init(HttpApplication context)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        context.EndRequest += (sender, e) => this.DisposeContext(sender, e);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static bool DoesRequestCompletionRequireDisposing(Di2015NewLine        string requestPath)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        string fileExtension = Path.GetExtension(requestPath)Di2015NewLine            .ToUpperInvariant();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        switch (fileExtension)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            case ".ASPX":Di2015NewLine            case string.Empty:Di2015NewLine            case null:Di2015NewLine                return true;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return false;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void DisposeContext(object sender, EventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // This gets fired for every request to the server, but there's no Di2015NewLine        // point trying to dispose anything if the request is for (e.g.) a Di2015NewLine        // gif, so only call Dispose() if necessary:Di2015NewLine        string requestedFilePath = ((HttpApplication)sender).Request.FilePath;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (DoesRequestCompletionRequireDisposing(requestedFilePath))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            this._context.Dispose();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

9078491Di2015UniqueSeparatorvoid bw_DoWork(object sender, DoWorkEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    CancellationTokenSource _tokenSource = new CancellationTokenSource();Di2015NewLine CancellationToken();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (urls == null) return;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var i = 0;Di2015NewLine    var a = 100 / urls.Count();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var sb = new StringBuilder();Di2015NewLine    var t = urls.Select(url => Task.Factory.StartNew(Di2015NewLine                    (u) =>{Di2015NewLine                        using (var wc = new WebClient())Di2015NewLine                        {Di2015NewLine                            lock (this){Di2015NewLine                                var s = wc.DownloadString(u.ToString());Di2015NewLine                                sb.AppendFormat("{1}:{0}\\r\\n", "", u);Di2015NewLine                            }Di2015NewLine                        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    if (Worker.CancellationPending){Di2015NewLine                        //MAGIC HAPPENS HERE, IF BackgroundWorker IS REQUESTEDDi2015NewLine                        //TO CANCEL, WE CANCEL CancellationTokenSourceDi2015NewLine                        _tokenSource.Cancel();Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    //IF CANCELATION REQUESTED VIA CancellationTokenSourceDi2015NewLine                    //THROW EXCEPTION WHICH WILL ADD TO AggreegateExceptionDi2015NewLine                    _token.ThrowIfCancellationRequested();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    //YOU CAN IGNORE FOLLOWING 2 LINESDi2015NewLine                    i += a;Di2015NewLine                    Worker.ReportProgress(i, u);Di2015NewLine    }, url, _token)).ToArray();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    tryDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Task.WaitAll(t);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    catch (AggregateException age)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (age.InnerException is OperationCanceledException)Di2015NewLine            sb.Append("Task canceled");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    catch (Exception ex)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        sb.Append(ex.Message);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    e.Result = sb;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

9081295Di2015UniqueSeparator// Create the bitmap we'll render toDi2015NewLineRenderTargetBitmap bmp = Di2015NewLine            new RenderTargetBitmap(100, 100, // SizeDi2015NewLine                                                    96, 96, // DPI Di2015NewLine                                                    PixelFormats.Pbgra32);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Create a list of random circle geometriesDi2015NewLineList<Geometry> geoList = new List<Geometry>();Di2015NewLineRandom rand = new Random();Di2015NewLinefor (int i=0; i<10; i++)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    double radius = rand.Next(5, 10);Di2015NewLine    Point center = new Point(rand.Next(25, 75), rand.Next(25,75));Di2015NewLine    geoList.Add(new EllipseGeometry(center, radius, radius));Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine// The light-weight visual element that will draw the geometriesDi2015NewLineDrawingVisual viz = new DrawingVisual();Di2015NewLineusing (DrawingContext dc = viz.RenderOpen())Di2015NewLine{ // The DC lets us draw to the DrawingVisual directlyDi2015NewLine    foreach (var g in geoList)Di2015NewLine        dc.DrawGeometry(Brushes.Red, null, g);Di2015NewLine} // the DC is closed as it falls out of the using statementDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// draw the visual on the bitmapDi2015NewLinebmp.Render(viz);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// instantiate an encoder to save the fileDi2015NewLinePngBitmapEncoder pngEncoder = new PngBitmapEncoder();Di2015NewLine// add this bitmap to the encoders set of framesDi2015NewLinepngEncoder.Frames.Add(BitmapFrame.Create(bmp));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// save the bitmap as an .png fileDi2015NewLineusing (FileStream file = new FileStream("Spots.png", FileMode.Create))Di2015NewLine    pngEncoder.Save(file);Di2015NewLine
9081295Di2015UniqueSeparator// I'm generating the glyphs differently for testing.Di2015NewLine// I tested with fontName="Arial"Di2015NewLineTypeface face = new Typeface(fontName);Di2015NewLineGlyphTypeface font;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineif (!face.TryGetGlyphTypeface(out font))Di2015NewLine    return; // bail if something goes wrongDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineint ColumnCount = 10;Di2015NewLineint MaxDrawCount = 30; // use int.MaxValue to draw them all            Di2015NewLinedouble fontSize = 50d;Di2015NewLine// the height of each cell has to include over/underhanging glyphsDi2015NewLineSize cellSize = new Size(fontSize, fontSize * font.Height);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinevar Glyphs = from glyphIndex in font.CharacterToGlyphMap.ValuesDi2015NewLine                    select font.GetGlyphOutline(glyphIndex, fontSize, 1d);            Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// now create the visual we'll draw them toDi2015NewLineDrawingVisual viz = new DrawingVisual();Di2015NewLineint drawCount = -1;Di2015NewLineusing (DrawingContext dc = viz.RenderOpen())Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    foreach (var g in Glyphs)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        drawCount++;Di2015NewLine        if (drawCount >= MaxDrawCount)Di2015NewLine            break; // don't draw more than you wantDi2015NewLine        if (g.IsEmpty()) continue; // don't draw the blank onesDi2015NewLine        // center horizontally in the cellDi2015NewLine        double xOffset = (drawCount % ColumnCount) * cellSize.Width + cellSize.Width / 2d - g.Bounds.Width / 2d;Di2015NewLine        // place the character on the baseline of the cellDi2015NewLine        double yOffset = (drawCount / ColumnCount) * cellSize.Height + fontSize * font.Baseline;Di2015NewLine        dc.PushTransform(new TranslateTransform(xOffset, yOffset));Di2015NewLine        dc.DrawGeometry(Brushes.Red, null, g);Di2015NewLine        dc.Pop(); // get rid of the transformDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineint RowCount = drawCount / ColumnCount;Di2015NewLineif (drawCount % ColumnCount != 0) Di2015NewLine    RowCount++; // to include partial rowsDi2015NewLineint bitWidth = (int)Math.Ceiling(cellSize.Width * ColumnCount);Di2015NewLineint bitHeight = (int)Math.Ceiling(cellSize.Height * RowCount);Di2015NewLineRenderTargetBitmap bmp = new RenderTargetBitmap(Di2015NewLine                                                bitWidth, bitHeight,Di2015NewLine                                                96, 96,Di2015NewLine                                                PixelFormats.Pbgra32);Di2015NewLinebmp.Render(viz);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinePngBitmapEncoder encoder = new PngBitmapEncoder();Di2015NewLineencoder.Frames.Add(BitmapFrame.Create(bmp));Di2015NewLineusing (FileStream file = new FileStream("FontTable.png", FileMode.Create))Di2015NewLine    encoder.Save(file);Di2015NewLine

9081931Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic IEnumerable<string> GetAllSubordinateEmployeeIdsByUserId(string userId)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // Retrieve only the fields that create the self-referencing relationship from all nodesDi2015NewLine    var employees = (from e in GetAllEmployees()Di2015NewLine                     select new { e.Id, e.SupervisorId });Di2015NewLine    // Dictionary with optimal size for searchingDi2015NewLine    Dictionary<string, string> dicEmployees = new Dictionary<string, string>(employees.Count() * 4);Di2015NewLine    // This queue holds any subordinate employees we find so that we may eventually identify their subordinates as wellDi2015NewLine    Queue<string> subordinates = new Queue<string>();Di2015NewLine    // This list holds the child nodes we're searching forDi2015NewLine    List<string> subordinateIds = new List<string>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Load the dictionary with all nodesDi2015NewLine    foreach (var e in employees)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        dicEmployees.Add(e.Id, e.SupervisorId);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Get the key (employee's ID) for each value (employee's supervisor's ID) that matches the value we passed inDi2015NewLine    var directReports = (from d in dicEmployeesDi2015NewLine                         where d.Value == userIdDi2015NewLine                         select d.Key);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Add the child nodes to the queueDi2015NewLine    foreach (var d in directReports)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        subordinates.Enqueue(d);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // While the queue has a node in it...Di2015NewLine    while (subordinates.Count > 0)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Retrieve the children of the next node in the queueDi2015NewLine        var node = subordinates.Dequeue();Di2015NewLine        var childNodes = (from e in dicEmployeesDi2015NewLine                          where e.Value == nodeDi2015NewLine                          select e.Key);Di2015NewLine        if (childNodes.Count() != 0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Add the child nodes to the queueDi2015NewLine            foreach (var c in childNodes)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                subordinates.Enqueue(c);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        // Add the node from the queue to the list of child nodesDi2015NewLine        subordinateIds.Add(node);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return subordinateIds.AsEnumerable();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

9083495Di2015UniqueSeparator    private static IEnumerable<T> Cycle<T>(List<T> data, int num)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var start = num%data.Count;Di2015NewLine        for(var i=0;i<data.Count;i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            yield return data[(i+start)%data.Count];Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

9084804Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic void Send()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    string response;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Connect(session.Sender, 25);Di2015NewLine    response = Response();Di2015NewLine    if (response.Substring(0, 3) != "220")Di2015NewLine        throw new SmtpException(response);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Write("HELO {0}\\r\\n", Util.GetIPAddress());Di2015NewLine    response = Response();Di2015NewLine    if (response.Substring(0, 3) != "250")Di2015NewLine        throw new SmtpException(response);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Write("MAIL FROM:<{0}>\\r\\n", session.MailFrom);Di2015NewLine    response = Response();Di2015NewLine    if (response.Substring(0, 3) != "250")Di2015NewLine        throw new SmtpException(response);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    session.Recipients.ForEach(address =>Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Write("RCPT TO:<{0}>\\r\\n", address);Di2015NewLine            response = Response();Di2015NewLine            if (response.Substring(0, 3) != "250")Di2015NewLine                throw new SmtpException(response);Di2015NewLine        });Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Write("DATA\\r\\n");Di2015NewLine    response = Response();Di2015NewLine    if (response.Substring(0, 3) != "354")Di2015NewLine        throw new SmtpException(response);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    NetworkStream stream = GetStream();Di2015NewLine    stream.Write(session.Message, 0, session.Message.Length);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Write("\\r\\n.\\r\\n");Di2015NewLine    response = Response();Di2015NewLine    if (response.Substring(0, 3) != "250")Di2015NewLine        throw new SmtpException(response);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Write("QUIT\\r\\n");Di2015NewLine    response = Response();Di2015NewLine    if (response.IndexOf("221") == -1)Di2015NewLine        throw new SmtpException(response);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

9085284Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class RecurrenceDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public int Id { get; protected set; }Di2015NewLine    public DateTime StartDate { get; protected set; }Di2015NewLine    public DateTime? EndDate { get; protected set; }Di2015NewLine    public long? RecurrenceInterval { get; protected set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // returns the set of DateTimes within [subStart, subEnd] that areDi2015NewLine    // of the form StartDate + k*RecurrenceInterval, where k is an IntegerDi2015NewLine    public IEnumerable<DateTime> GetBetween(DateTime subStart, DateTime subEnd)Di2015NewLine    {            Di2015NewLine        long stride = RecurrenceInterval ?? 1;Di2015NewLine        if (stride < 1) Di2015NewLine            throw new ArgumentException("Need a positive recurrence stride");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        long realStart, realEnd;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // figure out where we really need to startDi2015NewLine        if (StartDate >= subStart)Di2015NewLine            realStart = StartDate.Ticks;Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            long rem = subStart.Ticks % stride;Di2015NewLine            if (rem == 0)Di2015NewLine                realStart = subStart.Ticks;Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine                // break off the incomplete stride and add a full oneDi2015NewLine                realStart = subStart.Ticks - rem + stride;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        // figure out where we really need to stopDi2015NewLine        if (EndDate <= subEnd)Di2015NewLine            // we know EndDate has a value. Null can't be "less than" somethingDi2015NewLine            realEnd = EndDate.Value.Ticks; Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            long rem = subEnd.Ticks % stride;Di2015NewLine            // break off any incomplete strideDi2015NewLine            realEnd = subEnd.Ticks - rem;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        if (realEnd < realStart)Di2015NewLine            yield break; // the intersection is emptyDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // now yield all the results in the intersection of the setsDi2015NewLine        for (long t = realStart; t <= realEnd; t += stride)Di2015NewLine            yield return new DateTime(t);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

9085601Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static string ReauthenticateOn401(Di2015NewLine    Func<Authenticator, string> method, Di2015NewLine    ref Authenticator authenticator)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (method == null)Di2015NewLine        throw new ArgumentNullException("action");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (authenticator == null)Di2015NewLine        throw new ArgumentNullException("authenticator");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    int attempts_remaining = 2;Di2015NewLine    bool reauth_attempted = false;Di2015NewLine    while (attempts_remaining > 0)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        tryDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return method(authenticator);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        catch (WebException e)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (e.Response != null && reauth_attempted == false)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (((HttpWebResponse)e.Response).StatusCode == HttpStatusCode.Unauthorized)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    authenticator.GetAuthToken();Di2015NewLine                    reauth_attempted = true;Di2015NewLine                    attempts_remaining--;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                elseDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    throw;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                throw;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    throw new Exception("The ReauthenticateOn401 method failed to return a response or catch/throw an exception.  The log flowed outside the while loop (not expected to be possible) and is generating this generic exception");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine

9089039Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing VeParser;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class MathEvaluator : CharParserDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    protected override Parser GetRootParser()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Func<double, double, double> productFunc = (value1, value2) => value1 * value2;Di2015NewLine        Func<double, double, double> divideFunc = (value1, value2) => value1 / value2;Di2015NewLine        Func<double, double, double> sumFunc = (value1, value2) => value1 + value2;Di2015NewLine        Func<double, double, double> subtractFunc = (value1, value2) => value1 - value2;Di2015NewLine        Func<double, double> negativeFunc = value => -value;Di2015NewLine        Func<double, double> posititveFunc = value => value;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var dot = token('.');Di2015NewLine        var op = token('(');Di2015NewLine        var cp = token(')');Di2015NewLine        var sumOp = create(sumFunc, token('+'));Di2015NewLine        var subtractOp = create(subtractFunc, token('-'));Di2015NewLine        var positiveOp = create(posititveFunc, token('+'));Di2015NewLine        var negativeOp = create(negativeFunc, token('-'));Di2015NewLine        var productOp = create(productFunc, token('*'));Di2015NewLine        var divideOp = create(divideFunc, token('/'));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // NumbersDi2015NewLine        var deciamlPlaceValue = 1M;Di2015NewLine        var decimalDot = run(() => { deciamlPlaceValue = 1; }, dot);Di2015NewLine        var digit = consume((n, d) => n * 10 + char.GetNumericValue(d), keep(Digit));Di2015NewLine        var decimalDigit = consume((n, d) => { deciamlPlaceValue = deciamlPlaceValue * 10; return (double)((decimal)n + ((decimal)char.GetNumericValue(d)) / deciamlPlaceValue); }, keep(Digit));Di2015NewLine        var number = any(Di2015NewLine            /* float */  create(0, seq(zeroOrMore(digit), decimalDot, oneOrMore(decimalDigit))),Di2015NewLine            /* int   */  create(0, oneOrMore(digit))Di2015NewLine        );Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var expression = createReference();Di2015NewLine        var simpleExpression = createReference();Di2015NewLine        // UnaryDi2015NewLine        var unaryOp = any(positiveOp, negativeOp);Di2015NewLine        var unaryExpression = update(d => d.action(d.value),Di2015NewLine                    createNew(seq(set("action", unaryOp), set("value", expression))));Di2015NewLine        // BinaryDi2015NewLine        var binaryOp = any(sumOp, subtractOp, productOp, divideOp);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var binaryExpressinoTree = update(x => x.value1, createNew(Di2015NewLine            seq(Di2015NewLine                set("value1", simpleExpression),Di2015NewLine                zeroOrMore(Di2015NewLine                    update(d => { var r = base.CreateDynamicObject(); r.value1 = d.action(d.value1, d.value2); return r; },Di2015NewLine                        seq(Di2015NewLine                            set("action", binaryOp),Di2015NewLine                            set("value2", simpleExpression))))Di2015NewLine            )));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var privilegedExpressoin = seq(op, expression, cp);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        setReference(simpleExpression, any(privilegedExpressoin, unaryExpression, number));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        setReference(expression, any(binaryExpressinoTree, simpleExpression));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return seq(expression, endOfFile());Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static object Eval(string expression)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        MathEvaluator me = new MathEvaluator();Di2015NewLine        var result = me.Parse(expression.ToCharArray());Di2015NewLine        return result;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

9090805Di2015UniqueSeparator public List<DataColumn> GetColumnInfoFromStoredProcResult(string schema, string storedProcName)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        //build sql textDi2015NewLine        var sb = new StringBuilder();Di2015NewLine        sb.Append("SET FMTONLY OFF; SET FMTONLY ON; \\n");//this is how EF4.1 did so I copied..not sure why the repeatDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        sb.Append(String.Format("exec {0}.{1} ", schema, storedProcName));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var prms = GetStoredProcedureParameters(schema: schema, sprocName: storedProcName);Di2015NewLine        var count = 1;Di2015NewLine        foreach (var param in prms)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            sb.Append(String.Format("{0}=null", param.Name));Di2015NewLine            if (count < prms.Count)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                sb.Append(", ");Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            count++;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        sb.Append("\\n SET FMTONLY OFF; SET FMTONLY OFF;");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var ds = new DataSet();Di2015NewLine        using (var sqlConnection = this.SqlConnection)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            using (var sqlAdapter = new SqlDataAdapter(sb.ToString(), sqlConnection))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (sqlConnection.State != ConnectionState.Open) sqlConnection.Open();Di2015NewLine                sqlAdapter.SelectCommand.ExecuteReader(CommandBehavior.SchemaOnly);Di2015NewLine                sqlConnection.Close();Di2015NewLine                sqlAdapter.FillSchema(ds, SchemaType.Source, "MyTable");Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var list = ds.Tables[0].Columns.Cast<DataColumn>().ToList();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return list;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public List<SqlParamInfo> GetStoredProcedureParameters(string schema, string sprocName)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var sqlText = String.Format(Di2015NewLine            @"SELECTDi2015NewLine                [Name] = N'@RETURN_VALUE',Di2015NewLine                [ID] = 0,Di2015NewLine                [Direction] = 6,Di2015NewLine                [UserType] = NULL,Di2015NewLine                [SystemType] = N'int',Di2015NewLine                [Size] = 4,Di2015NewLine                [Precision] = 10,Di2015NewLine                [Scale] = 0Di2015NewLine            WHEREDi2015NewLine                OBJECTPROPERTY(OBJECT_ID(N'{0}.{1}'), 'IsProcedure') = 1Di2015NewLine            UNIONDi2015NewLine            SELECTDi2015NewLine                [Name] = CASE WHEN p.name <> '' THEN p.name ELSE '@RETURN_VALUE' END,Di2015NewLine                [ID] = p.parameter_id,Di2015NewLine                [Direction] = CASE WHEN p.is_output = 0 THEN 1 WHEN p.parameter_id > 0 AND p.is_output = 1 THEN 3 ELSE 6 END,Di2015NewLine                [UserType] = CASE WHEN ut.is_assembly_type = 1 THEN SCHEMA_NAME(ut.schema_id) + '.' + ut.name ELSE NULL END,Di2015NewLine                [SystemType] = CASE WHEN ut.is_assembly_type = 0 AND ut.user_type_id = ut.system_type_id THEN ut.name WHEN ut.is_user_defined = 1 OR ut.is_assembly_type = 0 THEN st.name WHEN ut.is_table_type =1 Then 'STRUCTURED' ELSE 'UDT' END,Di2015NewLine                [Size] = CONVERT(int, CASE WHEN st.name IN (N'text', N'ntext', N'image') AND p.max_length = 16 THEN -1 WHEN st.name IN (N'nchar', N'nvarchar', N'sysname') AND p.max_length >= 0 THEN p.max_length/2 ELSE p.max_length END),Di2015NewLine                [Precision] = p.precision,Di2015NewLine                [Scale] = p.scaleDi2015NewLine            FROMDi2015NewLine                sys.all_parameters pDi2015NewLine                INNER JOIN sys.types ut ON p.user_type_id = ut.user_type_idDi2015NewLine                LEFT OUTER JOIN sys.types st ON ut.system_type_id = st.user_type_id AND ut.system_type_id = st.system_type_idDi2015NewLine            WHEREDi2015NewLine                object_id = OBJECT_ID(N'{0}.{1}') Di2015NewLine            ORDER BY 2", schema, sprocName);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        using (var sqlConnection = this.SqlConnection)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            using (var sqlCommand = new SqlCommand())Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (sqlConnection.State != ConnectionState.Open) sqlConnection.Open();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                sqlCommand.Connection = sqlConnection;Di2015NewLine                sqlCommand.CommandType = CommandType.Text;Di2015NewLine                sqlCommand.CommandText = sqlText;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                var dr = sqlCommand.ExecuteReader();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                var result = new List<SqlParamInfo>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                while (dr.Read())Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    if (Convert.ToString(dr["Name"]) != "@RETURN_VALUE")Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        result.Add(new SqlParamInfo(dr));Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                return result;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

9092482Di2015UniqueSeparator    public bool Subscribe(GUID key)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        tryDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (Subscribers == null)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                Subscribers = new Dictionary<GUID, IAdvServiceCallback>();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            lock (Subscribers)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                IServiceCallback callback = OperationContext.Current.GetCallbackChannel<IServiceCallback>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                if (!Subscribers.ContainsKey(key))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    Subscribers.Add(key,callback);Di2015NewLine                    ICommunicationObject obj = (ICommunicationObject)callback;Di2015NewLine                    obj.Closed += SubscribedServiceClosed;Di2015NewLine                    obj.Faulted += SubscribedServiceFaulted;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                elseDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    //log subscriber is registeredDi2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            return true;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        catch (Exception ex)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return false;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine       {Di2015NewLine                return true;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            lock (Subscribers)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                IServiceCallback callback = OperationContext.Current.GetCallbackChannel<IServiceCallback>();Di2015NewLine                if (Subscribers.ContainsValue(callback))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    var row = Subscribers.Where(v => v.Value == callback).FirstOrDefault();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    Subscribers.Remove(row.Key);Di2015NewLine                }    Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            return true;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        catch(Exception ex)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return false;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

9097614Di2015UniqueSeparatorResultData Parse(String value, ref Int32 index)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    ResultData result = new ResultData();Di2015NewLine    Index startIndex = index; // Used to get substringsDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    while (index < value.Length) Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Char current = value[index];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (current == '(')Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            index++;Di2015NewLine            result.Add(Parse(value, ref index));Di2015NewLine            startIndex = index;Di2015NewLine            continue;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        if (current == ')')Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Push last resultDi2015NewLine           index++;Di2015NewLine           return result;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Process all other chars hereDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // We can't find the closing bracketDi2015NewLine    throw new Exception("String is not valid");Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

Form1() {Di2015NewLine            InitializeComponent();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private void Form1_Load(object sender, EventArgs e) {Di2015NewLine            //File with meta data addedDi2015NewLine            string InputFile = Path.Combine(Environment.GetFolderPath(Environment.SpecialFolder.Desktop), "Test.pdf");Di2015NewLine            //File with meta data removedDi2015NewLine            string OutputFile = Path.Combine(Environment.GetFolderPath(Environment.SpecialFolder.Desktop), "Output.pdf");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //Create a file with meta data, nothing special hereDi2015NewLine            using (FileStream FS = new FileStream(InputFile, FileMode.Create, FileAccess.Write, FileShare.None)) {Di2015NewLine                using (Document Doc = new Document(PageSize.LETTER)) {Di2015NewLine                    using (PdfWriter writer = PdfWriter.GetInstance(Doc, FS)) {Di2015NewLine test");Di2015NewLine                        //Add a custom headerDi2015NewLine                        Doc.AddHeader("Test Header", "This is also a test");Di2015NewLine                        Doc.Close();Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //Read our newly created fileDi2015NewLine {Di2015NewLine                R.Info.Remove(KV.Key);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //The code above modifies an in-memory representation of the PDF, we need to write these changes to disk nowDi2015NewLine            using (FileStream FS = new FileStream(OutputFile, FileMode.Create, FileAccess.Write, FileShare.None)) {Di2015NewLine                using (Document Doc = new Document()) {Di2015NewLine                    //Use the PdfCopy object to copy each pageDi2015NewLine                    using (PdfCopy writer = new PdfCopy(Doc, FS)) {Di2015NewLine        //Add it to the new documentDi2015NewLine                            writer.AddPage(writer.GetImportedPage(R, i));Di2015NewLine                        }Di2015NewLine                        Doc.Close();Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            this.Close();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

9099227Di2015UniqueSeparator// The car class itselfDi2015NewLinepublic class CarDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // This event is raised when the production property changesDi2015NewLine    public event EventHandler<PropertyValueChange<DateTime>> ProductionChanged;Di2015NewLine    DateTime _production; // private dataDi2015NewLine    public DateTime ProductionDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        get { return _production; }Di2015NewLine        setDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (value == _production) return; // don't raise the event if it didn't changeDi2015NewLine            var eventArgs = new PropertyValueChange<DateTime>(_production, value);Di2015NewLine            _production = value;Di2015NewLine            // If anyone is "listening," raise the eventDi2015NewLine            if (ProductionChanged != null)Di2015NewLine                ProductionChanged(this, eventArgs);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine// Class that contains the dictionary of production to car listsDi2015NewLineclass FooDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    Dictionary<DateTime, ObservableCollection<Car>> ProductionToCars = new Dictionary<DateTime, ObservableCollection<Car>>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void Add(Car c)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        _Add(c);Di2015NewLine        // We want to be notified when the car's production changesDi2015NewLine        c.ProductionChanged += this.OnCarProductionChanged;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    // This is called when a car's value changes, and moves the carDi2015NewLine    void OnCarProductionChanged(object sender, PropertyValueChange<DateTime> e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Car c = sender as Car;Di2015NewLine        if (c == null) return;Di2015NewLine        ProductionToCars[e.OldValue].Remove(c);Di2015NewLine        _Add(c);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    // this actually places the car in the (currently correct) groupDi2015NewLine    private void _Add(Car c)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        ObservableCollection<Car> collection;Di2015NewLine        // Find the collection for this car's yearDi2015NewLine        if (!ProductionToCars.TryGetValue(c.Production, out collection))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // if we couldn't find it, create itDi2015NewLine            collection = new ObservableCollection<Car>();Di2015NewLine            ProductionToCars.Add(c.Production, collection);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        // Now place him in the correct collectionDi2015NewLine        collection.Add(c);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine// This class encapsulates the information we'll pass when the property value changesDi2015NewLinepublic class PropertyValueChange<T> : EventArgsDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public T OldValue;Di2015NewLine    public T NewValue;Di2015NewLine    public PropertyValueChange(T oldValue, T newValue)Di2015NewLine 9101112Di2015UniqueSeparator# First, load the assembly with the Resolver class. I actually put it in the same Di2015NewLine# core library, but it really doesn't matter where it is. When the core assemblyDi2015NewLine# fails at first to resolve, the Resolver's handler is automatically called, Di2015NewLine# and everything is peachyDi2015NewLine$encoder = New-Object mycorp.mylib.anamespace.aclassDi2015NewLine$result = $encoder.DoStuff( $x, $y, $z ... etc )Di2015NewLine

9101667Di2015UniqueSeparator// First create the instance we'll want to play withDi2015NewLineMyUserControl myControlInstance = new MyUsercontrol();Di2015NewLine// MyUserContol has two properties we'll be usingDi2015NewLine// DateTime StartDateDi2015NewLine// int SocialSecurityNumberDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Now we're creating a map to facilitate access to the propertiesDi2015NewLine// of "myControlInstance" using stringsDi2015NewLinePropertyMap<MyUserControl> map = Di2015NewLine             new PropertyMap<MyUserControl>(myControlInstance);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Since the map is directed toward "myControlInstance"Di2015NewLine// this line is equivalent to:Di2015NewLine// myControlInstance.StartDate = Datetime.Now;Di2015NewLinemap.Set<DateTime>("StartDate", DateTime.Now);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// This line is equivalent to:Di2015NewLine// ssn = myUsercontrol.SocialSecurityNumber;Di2015NewLineint ssn = map.Get<int>("SocialSecurityNumber");Di2015NewLine
9101667Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class PropertyMap<T>Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    readonly T Instance;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public PropertyMap(T instance)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Instance = instance;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public U Get<U>(string PropertyName)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Search through the type's properties for one with this nameDi2015NewLine        // Properties are things with get/set accessorsDi2015NewLine        PropertyInfo property = typeof(T).GetProperty(PropertyName);Di2015NewLine        if (property == null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // if we couldn't find a property, look for a field.Di2015NewLine            // Fields are just member variables, but you can onlyDi2015NewLine            // manipulate public ones like this.Di2015NewLine            FieldInfo field = typeof(T).GetField(PropertyName);Di2015NewLine            if (field == null)Di2015NewLine                throw new Exception("Couldn't find a property/field named " + PropertyName);Di2015NewLine            return (U)field.GetValue(Instance);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return (U)property.GetValue(Instance, null);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void Set<U>(string PropertyName, U value)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Search through the type's properties for one with this nameDi2015NewLine        PropertyInfo property = typeof(T).GetProperty(PropertyName);Di2015NewLine        if (property == null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // if we couldn't find a property, look for a field.Di2015NewLine            FieldInfo field = typeof(T).GetField(PropertyName);Di2015NewLine            if (field == null)Di2015NewLine                throw new Exception("Couldn't find a property/field named " + PropertyName);Di2015NewLine            field.SetValue(Instance, value);Di2015NewLine            return;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        property.SetValue(Instance, value, null);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

9103778Di2015UniqueSeparator    public List<iSymbol> GetInvertedGroup()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        TrimSymbolList();Di2015NewLine        List<List<iSymbol>> symbols = this.CopyListMembers(Symbols);Di2015NewLine        List<iSymbol> SymList;Di2015NewLine        while (symbols.Count > 1)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            symbols.Add(MultiplyLists(symbols[0], symbols[1]));Di2015NewLine            symbols.RemoveRange(0, 2);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        SymList = symbols[0];Di2015NewLine        for(int i=0;i<symbols[0].Count;i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (SymList[i] is Symbol)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                Symbol sym = SymList[i] as Symbol;Di2015NewLine                SymList.RemoveAt(i--);Di2015NewLine                Symbol_Group symgrp = new Symbol_Group(null);Di2015NewLine                symgrp.AddSymbol(sym);Di2015NewLine                SymList.Add(symgrp);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < SymList.Count; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (SymList[i] is Symbol_Group)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                Symbol_Group SymGrp = SymList[i] as Symbol_Group;Di2015NewLine                if (SymGrp.Symbols.Count > 1)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    List<iSymbol> list = SymGrp.GetInvertedGroup();Di2015NewLine                    SymList.RemoveAt(i--);Di2015NewLine                    AddElementsOf(list, SymList);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return SymList;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public List<iSymbol> MultiplyLists(List<iSymbol> L1, List<iSymbol> L2)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        List<iSymbol> Combined = new List<iSymbol>(L1.Count + L2.Count);Di2015NewLine        foreach (iSymbol S1 in L1)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            foreach (iSymbol S2 in L2)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                Symbol_Group newGrp = new Symbol_Group(null);Di2015NewLine                newGrp.AddSymbol(S1);Di2015NewLine                newGrp.AddSymbol(S2);Di2015NewLine                Combined.Add(newGrp);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return Combined;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine
9103778Di2015UniqueSeparator    public List<List<Symbol>> ReduceList(List<iSymbol> List)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        List<List<Symbol>> Output = new List<List<Symbol>>(List.Count);Di2015NewLine        foreach (iSymbol iSym in List)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (iSym is Symbol_Group)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                List<Symbol> L = new List<Symbol>();Di2015NewLine                (iSym as Symbol_Group).GetAllSymbols(L);Di2015NewLine                Output.Add(L);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                throw (new Exception());Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return Output;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void GetAllSymbols(List<Symbol> List)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        foreach (List<iSymbol> SubList in Symbols)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            foreach (iSymbol iSym in SubList)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (iSym is Symbol)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    List.Add(iSym as Symbol);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                else if (iSym is Symbol_Group)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    (iSym as Symbol_Group).GetAllSymbols(List);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                elseDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    throw(new Exception());Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

9107370Di2015UniqueSeparator    public class myMouseClass: IMessageFilter //Must implement IMessageFilterDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        [DllImport("user32.dll", CharSet = CharSet.Auto, CallingConvention = CallingConvention.StdCall)]Di2015NewLine        public static extern void mouse_event(long dwFlags, long dx, long dy, long cButtons, long dwExtraInfo);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //Constants Di2015NewLine        private const int MOUSEEVENTF_LEFTDOWN = 0x02;Di2015NewLine        private const int MOUSEEVENTF_LEFTUP = 0x04;Di2015NewLine        private const int MOUSEEVENTF_RIGHTDOWN = 0x08;Di2015NewLine        private const int MOUSEEVENTF_RIGHTUP = 0x10;Di2015NewLine        private const int WM_MOUSEMOVE = 0x0200;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private int Threshold = 20; //how far the mouse should move to reset timerDi2015NewLine        private int StartLocationX = 0; //stores starting X valueDi2015NewLine        private int StartLocationY = 0; //stores starting Y valueDi2015NewLine        private Timer timerHold = new Timer(); //timer to trigger mouse clickDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //Start Mouse monitoring by calling this. This will also set the timer.     Di2015NewLine        private void StartFilterMouseEvents()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            timerHold.Interval = 1000; //how long mouse must be in threshold.Di2015NewLine            timerHold.Tick = new EventHandler(timerHold_Tick);Di2015NewLine            Application.AddMessageFilter((IMessageFilter) this);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        //Stop Mouse monitoring by calling this and unset the timer.Di2015NewLine        private void StopFilterMouseEvents()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            timerHold.Stop();Di2015NewLine            timerHold -= timerHold_Tick;Di2015NewLine            Application.RemoveMessageFilter((IMessageFilter) this);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        //This will start when Application.AddMessageFilter() is calledDi2015NewLine        public bool PreFilterMessage(ref Message m)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (m.Msg == WM_MOUSEMOVE)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if((Cursor.Position.X > StartLocationX + 20)||(Cursor.Position.X > StartLocationX - 20))&&Di2015NewLine                       ((Cursor.Position.Y > StartLocationY + 20)||(Cursor.Position.Y > StartLocationY - 20))Di2015NewLine                       {Di2015NewLine                            timerHold.Stop(); //stops timer if runningDi2015NewLine                            timerHold.Start(); //starts it again with new position.Di2015NewLine                            StartLocationX = Cursor.Position.X;Di2015NewLine                            StartLocationY = Cursor.Position.Y;Di2015NewLine                       }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            return false;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        //This event gets fired when the timer has not been reset for 1000msDi2015NewLine        public void timerHold_Tick(object sender, EventArgs e)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            mouse_event(MOUSEEVENTF_LEFTDOWN | MOUSEEVENTF_LEFTUP, 0, 0, 0, 0);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLine
